lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everyone and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Dungeons & Dragons!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sam?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As I said last week, the Waterdeep: Dragon Heist is now available on D&D Beyond. As Max said last week. They'll guide your Waterdeep campaign from levels one to five. After that, explore the legendary Undermountain Dungeon below the city with Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage for levels five through 20! Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage is available for pre-order on D&D Beyond and will release November 2nd. Now, because D&D Beyond is such a generous sponsor of this show, Laura, I wanted to show the audience some of what we do with that sponsorship money. We take it and we turn it into this amazing studio which has amazing equipment and after effects and editing suites and cool special effects, so we put together a really cool ad for them using all the equipment, and if you guys would turn to the monitor and see what we made.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They didn't put any fucking effects on. I mean, we had it all mapped out. It was going to be amazing, and now it's just--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's really lame.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's pretty lame, and also kind of insulting to Matt. I mean, if you want to be honest about it. Sorry to the audience, and sorry to D&D Beyond. Back to you, Matt!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Sam.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yet more evidence why we should see the return of Max "Better Sam" James.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. One of these days, your escalation is going to be the end of us all. Not looking forward to it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Guys, for D&D Beyond, I brought a loaded gun!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of these days.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Guys, it's really amazing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh my god. On sale now we do have our very first live show in New York City. It's coming up pretty soon, actually, in two weeks. We'll be at the United Palace in Washington Heights, Thursday, October 4th for the live show. Tickets are still available now at Ticketmaster. You can check out all the details to do so at critrole.com.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sorry. No, just keep talking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I got to get it out now. Better now, than in the narrative. Also, for those who had a chance to see it, thank you so much for tuning in to this week's episode of Between the Sheets, our new show hosted by the fantastic Brian W. Foster. Taliesin was our first guinea pig for that. Really in-depth, awesome interview, and peek behind the--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Really blitzed on that stuff, it was pretty fun.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why did we start with a closer, though?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was a good call on my part.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well done, Taliesin. If you want to talk a little bit about the release schedule for that show, for Between the Sheets, it's every--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Every Monday, 7:00pm on Twitch is where it premieres. Then, of course, you can immediately catch it on VOD on Twitch if you've subscribed to us on Critical Role's Twitch. Critical Role's Twitch! I don't know; I'm pulling a Sam Riegel, I'm adding graphics that aren't here. There's a graphic, right? Then it releases on Wednesdays on Critical Role's YouTube channel at 10:00am, so if you do not catch it live or if you are not subscribed, you'll get it on Wednesday.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go, and to celebrate the launch of Between the Sheets, Brian's going to be doing a Reddit AMA tomorrow at 2:00pm Pacific. If you want to go ahead and razz him through text format, see him on the Critical Role Reddit tomorrow at 2:00pm Pacific. We've been raising a lot great money for Sam's charity, Pablove Foundation, if you want to talk a little bit about that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What am I supposed to talk about tonight? I'm supposed to talk about the fact that because you guys raised so much money, we're doing a one-shot tomorrow night on the Critical Role Twitch channel. We're going to do a Crash Pandas one-shot with me as the Game Master and people like Laura Bailey, Liam O'Brien, Marisha Ray, Travis Willingham--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I still have my purse on!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: -- Matt Mercer. Basically everyone at this table except for Taliesin will be there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I got some shit to do, people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Got enough coverage this week already; he can sit out a bit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tune in tomorrow night at 7:00 to see the show. We will also be giving away prizes to some lucky person who made a donation and tagged Critical Role in the donation field. That's it! Yay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Great. Laura, you said you wanted to talk about merch stuff?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! We got some things back in stock, y'all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're still wearing your purse, by the way

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I'm not, stop it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She had to think about it, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did! We got the Wildemount dice back in stock! The pretty blue ones that we have and then we got limited amount of The Mighty Nein pins back in stock. Check that out right now; they're awesome. We have the maps back in stock, and I have heard the t-shirts are being restocked very shortly. That means check it out this weekend, like Friday or Monday. They should be back in there so check it out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Refresh!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just refresh, and if you want them, they should be there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can find that at therookandtheraven.com/criticalrole to get all the info you need before midnight tonight. Check it out, guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yay sponsors!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Woo!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of the sweet effects, Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, someone will add some effects at some point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At some point.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pew pew.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I feel like we're really going to have to release that now with effects put onto it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Arsequeef will take care of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The water elemental's destroyed, and this entity that was once attacking you seems to have lowered their trident and turned around, their attention elsewhere, releasing any aggressive demeanor they have held since your arrival. At this time, you, Beau, as you turn the corner and mashed the face of Algar against the wet stone wall, you look over to see both Fjord slice the hand off of his right wrist--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, right or left?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, you also look over and notice there is this horrible, strange, undead entity floating immediately to your right of you and Algar, this spectral creature that is ethereal, but made of dark blue and black energy, this drowned spirit that is giving off this horrible, guttural sucking sound and Fjord still stands there, blade in hand, looming over the two of you, technically.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're hidden from all the rest of our views, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you guys know where they went, but you have no idea what's transpired since. Currently, Xundi is floating towards the back of the chamber, towards where they are. What do you do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fjord, is he with you? I'm pointing at the spectral guy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I shouldn't kill him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't think so. Might be unwise.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You all right, man?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I want that bracelet. I'll reach down and pick it up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You pick the bracelet and Algar's like, (groaning, pained panting).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll hold it in front of his face. You used this to control that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intimidation check with advantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm still holding him down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah. It was part of my post. What are you going to do? Please don't kill me. Please."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, it depends on how forthcoming you are. Anything I need to know to operate this thing or I just slap it on and start giving commands?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (uncertain noises)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ask him to put it back on!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to start covering distance.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Indeed. The hour is nigh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It puts out its hand. "You have seemingly come to the aid of this humble individual. Please, "hand me the implements of my enslavement."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: May I ask how you came to be enslaved in this predicament in the first place?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is not of your concern."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How about an answer for the bracelet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Algar's still "(moaning). Don't trust him!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I punch him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's right you do!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shut up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rest of you are closing up on this space.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're making our way there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys leap up and begin to climb. In the meantime, the creature looks to you and says, "Let's just say that there were powerful minds that were interested in the benefits of my "undivided attention towards things that were of not my interest."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sorry to hear that. I never like to see a creature put under the boot of somebody else for their gain. I'll toss him the bracelet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Catches it, picks up the necklace, and both of them get tucked inside of its vest with this heavy, wet sucking sound. Looks over to Algar. "It would appear that you have this taken care of, but would you do me the honors?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Actually, if you wouldn't mind, we have further need--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Questions, yeah. Just a conversation, maybe, first. Can you wait five minutes?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not even five minutes. Perhaps if he can tell us the safe way out of here in exchange for letting us have our way with Algar, he could be on his way and we can have our time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, do we do need from Algar--?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But I don't want to kill Algar.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You do want to kill Algar?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do not. Nope.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hand up, one sec. Yeah, I'm saying: Don't kill Algar.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'll give earmuffs to Algar. Still have my knee in his face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's bleeding out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I want to know if there's other booby traps.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're all watching?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you guys all now have gone into the chamber. You can see this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to attempt to do that thing I've seen Beauregard do so many times and foof up my biceps and look intimidating.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do we do with Algar?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm not sure yet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He might be dead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Algar?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll give him a little cheek slap.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's definitely passed out. He's not dead, but there is a large amount of blood coming out of his severed stump.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Guys need any help?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should we--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll tear off a sheet of ribbon off of my sleeve and I'll wrap it around his forearm like a tight tourniquet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a medicine check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want me to stabilize him? I can do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Khedive Xundi is my title. I've been held here "for too long. Should you find yourself among the endless seas of my world, come to my Silver Silt Palace."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Silver Silt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There I shall reward you for your assistance. Now, I'll go to free my partner."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, Xundi, real quick? Just seems like you were powering the entire city. How would we do that without you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's a good question," and it leaves.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What was the palace, what did he say?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Silver Silt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where was the palace, is it in the ocean?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm pretty sure--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was it in the ocean?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's probably not on land, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is everybody okay by the way do we have every-- Oh god! I'm going to cast Turn Undead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To the guy?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 14, what's your DC?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: DC on Turn Undead? Let me find it again--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your spell DC?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Spell DC is 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The specter goes (groaning) and immediately turns around and starts drifting down the hallway away from you, giving this horrible hollow sucking scream.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did we need him? Was he useful, too?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope, no. I just forgot he was there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, let's--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good job, Mr. Clay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If everyone's got a minute, does anybody need healing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Actually, Algar might need a quick--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have a question.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to start a ten minute--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we going to kill him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, if we don't, how do we get away without anyone knowing that we killed his guards and we let the guy go?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do you mean? Just tell him: don't tell anyone or we'll come back and kill you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if he goes in to like a protection service or something?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We need to have a conversation with him afterwards. We can tell him to leave the city and never come back or we'll take off your other hand!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like that. Plus, they're guards, it's their duty to fight, which they did and we defended ourselves.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I feel like--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, we weren't even going to attack if he hadn't attacked us in the first place.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Although, to play devil's advocate, you are right: he could change his mind down the line and try to get revenge on you or your mother.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't want him to get revenge on my mother.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll make it pretty quick.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can do other things to make sure--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we make it seem like Algar was the one who did all this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like maybe he turned--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did he see you, does he know who you are?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then why would connect anything to his mother? Unless we tell him. To your mother, I mean.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, because I heard Tracy say that she was staying at the fancy-- the Lavish Chateau.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a hotel that lots of Tracys I think probably stay at.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If we want to be really careful, there are other places to stay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm also curious to know what he is doing down here in the first place.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't you step aside, so that he doesn't see your face when he wakes up, or disguise your face so he hasn't--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, good call.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would like to throw my hat in the ring to say that I think he might need to die here, ja.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so we got two kills, four maybes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if we send him out to sea? Don't necessarily kill him, but make him leave and then make it seem like he was the one that did everything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think we're going to listen to your influence on this one, Jester; it is closest to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We do have one passage secured with Captain Adella. We could just tell Edér-- what's his name? Algar. That's Pillars of Eternity. We could just tell Algar: You have a new plot in life now and it's going to be to help Captain Adella.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, is Yasha going with Adella? No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's on a different boat, maybe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha's with you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I know but she's going to be leaving at some point soon, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She was making her way towards the sea, but hasn't made passage anywhere.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No hard plans. Well, let's wake up this son of a bitch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can always kill him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we'll get answers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Worst case scenario, we kill him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe best case scenario, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just put a pin in it and see what we find out here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you want to disguise yourself, before we do this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay, yes. I will disguise myself as a tortle, but not the that guy we met, like a tortle that's a girl.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Period.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I like that, a gortle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So exactly the same as the guy, except long hair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no hair, but, like, a skirt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. Tortle Skirts.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because girls wear skirts, obviously, that's what girls do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester needs to get out more.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tortles wear skorts.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At some point there's going to be a healing spell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I get back on top of Algar and I'm restraining him, pinning him down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does anybody not need healing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, Herr Clay, do you need healing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could use some healing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, what about yourself?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I'm getting in on this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I could use some, I don't know if you are sharing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You could do a Prayer of Healing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was what I've been doing, a Prayer of Healing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh really? We could both do Prayers of Healing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, so I'm doing everybody except Nott, and I'm adding Algar to this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to say I'm doing it, too, but I'm not really going to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On the count of three. One, two--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 14 points to everybody.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dear Traveler, please heal everyone. Do you guys feel better?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do actually, thank you. How many points?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thanks Mr. Clay and Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're welcome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the wave of healing divine energy emanates from Clay's focused point, Algar who's still being held against the wall by Beau, (gasping)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll bring the tip of the falchion right under his chin. You know, before we begin, we got this thing about calling out, yelling, really sensitive eardrums, so let's not do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Also, before we begin, I want to make sure that you know how serious we are in getting honesty from you. I take his head and I go whack-whack into the wall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Back unconscious!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to do Extort Truth on him, spend a ki point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, all right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He has to make a charisma saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 14.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 14 is the DC.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so he succeeds.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking fuck!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can try it again if you have another ki point.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh wait, no, let me see, I think he might be immune to it for the next 24 hours based on the ability.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What, to mine?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If he succeeds on it, yeah. I think so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well then, I go: I don't think you heard me. Whack-whack, and I'll try one more time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, I'm going to double check here, but I think if he succeeds in the save he's immune to it for 24 hours. I could be wrong. Let me double check here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Has it been 24 hours yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can wait 24 hours and then come back to it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's just sit here until it's Crash Pandas tomorrow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll lean over to Nott and say: Nott, do me a favor and make sure he's not carrying anything fancy in his pockets.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to rifle through all of his pockets with lightning speed agility of hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mm, not good. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12, okay. Rifling through his bits, you find 21 gold pieces, 45 silver pieces, two platinum pieces.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find one empty glass vial, where a healing potion was used previously. A dagger, and a basic hand crossbow with five bolts.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'll take the gold and the bolts, and everything else I'll throw in a puddle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perfect.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does he have any pretty buttons?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does he have any pretty buttons, Matthew?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He does, attached to the shirt, if you want to pluck them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will pluck the buttons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are six buttons.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I have to roll for each one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you're fine. To Extort Truth, no, you can continue to try it if you want to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I try it again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Spam it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Whack, whack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. With every more button pulled: (smack) Button. (smack) Button. You're teaming up on this regard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Real serious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that's a failure. That's a natural ten. Okay, you slam his head two more times and pinch an area underneath the bottom of the jaw. It causes his irises to swell for a little bit. He looks towards you, head lolling a little bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Now, you're going to answer all these nice man's questions, okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He doesn't answer, but you have his attention.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What was your job down here, and why were you giving commands to that creature with this bracelet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's my job. I was assigned as the supervisor of the Sluice Gate."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who do you report to?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I report to the Clovis Concord. I was assigned here maybe a few months back from Port "Zoon, but I largely, specifically, report to the Marquis and his associates."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Marquis...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Marquis, the...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Marquis Zhafe Uludan."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that guy, right? Lives in the palace guy?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, not LePual.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Demesne.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fjord, ask him if knowledge of that water creature that was here and is gone now, if that is known all the way to the top, or is it his bag, or--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The creature that was here and the magic used to control him, is that something that you brought to the table, or was that a device given to you and known in the higher ranks of government?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's resisting answering.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I dig that finger into his pressure point a little harder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intimidation check with advantage because you have him affected with the Extort--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, right, charisma. 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In his current position, he "(grunting) The Margrave and the Concord are "aware. This is one of two cities that runs with one of these marid underneath. (grunts)"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One of two cities?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And the other would be?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Port Damali."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. What else do you do here in Nicodranas? What do you do to pass the time, Algar? I'm trying to decide whether or not to hand you over to this fearsome beast over here, and I point to (laughing) Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the muscles popping?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It puts the lotion on its skin.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll make you into a jacket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I drink and carouse, buy fine linens and furniture."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good hobbies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You asked what he does with his spare time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You have any significant others in the city?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "None, really. I take companions. The Ruby is a very beautiful creature."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Agreed. I think we all know The Ruby of the Sea far and wide. Think she'd miss you if you went missing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A few more weeks of wooing her, yes."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, that's not how that shit works, man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a conflict inside where his masculine pride immediately hits with the hit to his ego that you just delivered.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What were you doing down here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My job."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What is your job, exactly?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "To maintain the Weave. To help exert my will on the creature that you just freed, so it "can direct water towards the various furnaces that run a lot of the engines that help maintain some "of the commerce here in the city."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja, and what happens to the commerce in the city now that you have fucked that up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll take weeks. It'll be expensive."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man, you're going to be in so much trouble.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Especially, I imagine, if they start looking into everything you did with that kind of power. I mean, having access to that kind of creature, I can't imagine that you were on the up-and-up about everything you did.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Especially if you start to admit that you did it all yourself. I'll use Mask of Many Faces to look just like him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: People have got to have to start asking questions, serious questions.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Who the fuck are you?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (as Algar) Who the fuck are you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intimidation check with advantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So badass!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks down at his severed hand, the stump having now healed over from the healing power of your prayer. "Look, please, I don't want to die. I don't want to die down here. I don't want to wash up in the middle of the shore."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know what I'm feeling like, Beau? That I just need to get out of this city and never come back, go somewhere far away. I hold up also a stump, because my hand is missing. I need to go, in a boat, and just go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Man, that sounds like a fine idea, Algar, doesn't it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Frumpkin starts to lovingly gnaw with his beak on the upper chin of Algar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That sounds like a great idea."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you think?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, man. You look like a Jorge.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to pick up the severed hand and start casting Decompose on it, too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to start backing up, shaking my head. You people are fucked up!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He nods. "Right, yeah, I'll go. I'll leave immediately. Just please let me go."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All depends on how we decide to act as we get out of here. I'm sure you know a very safe way to the surface, yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Same way I come in every day. Yeah, I'll show you out."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shall we?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do we do with him so nobody sees him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Must have a bag or something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just walk out with handless, bagged man?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, Yasha, what's in your bag you've been carrying?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not on her; it's up in the boat you guys had put in the water. She goes, "Mostly just "blankets and gold."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have a cloak.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we can wrap him up in a cloak and carry him out like we're carrying some equipment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I mean, (southern accent) Oh, all right. (whispering) Shit, I forgot to do the voice. How do you remember to do that all the time?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He doesn't, sometimes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Algar, you're going to be very helpful when it comes to making sure Algar knows who to talk to and the right things to say to get us out, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I'm sorry, Jorge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Jorge." He's still trying to pull away from the horrible, slow sucking of--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, it's a beak.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, the tentacles wrapping around the neck, and there's a slight biting right there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to pull out my disguise kit and give him a nice little beard and a mustache. And an eye patch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He sits there, held to the wall, being chewed on by a tiny octopus, for the next 30 minutes, while you roll-- Okay, roll for your disguise kit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm proficient with disguise, so I roll with advantage, because I'm--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not with advantage, but you get proficiency bonus, so roll a d20, add your dexterity modifier.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus proficiency, 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But he looks different, and is missing a hand, so it's definitely not Algar.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jorge, any traps, contraptions we should be aware of as we're heading out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, no traps. There are some lockdown failsafes, but it's not much help at the moment."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How far away is the other container for the other, I assume, creature under the same restraints we saw here? He mentioned going to free his compatriot?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: His partner in Port Damali, Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I thought there were two under Nicodranas.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I bet it's his partner in Port Damali.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gives you a look that doesn't nod, but you can see from his recognition that you hit the nail on the head.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: See? The accent, it makes me smarter.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was okay with the rolling blackouts in Nicodranas, but two cities I feel a little worse about. A little worse. They'll figure it out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The whole eastern seaboard is shut down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's a mage tower that goes up and down. This place will be fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're over-investing in genie-based power systems.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Technology, yeah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, Jorge, why don't you show us the way out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks to Beau to be let up, because he's still being pressed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a number of weapons, close-quarter smaller weapons for any combat that may take place in a tunnel. There's a small sketch with charcoal or some sort of a darker chalk on the wall that outlines the layout of the Sluice Weave for those that are coming in to see where they're trying to go and get to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I take a good long look at it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I draw a dick on it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Great, now I have to remember that as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, you do. It's part of it now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pre-dick or post-dick?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's in. Is it in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He pushes it open quietly, and it leads you into a small office. It's got a small desk, it's got a stool, it's got some odd stacks of paper, looks like there's a quill and an inkwell, a second unopened inkwell. There's some partially melted candles that aren't lit at the moment, and there is a door that exits. He unlocks that door.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just a moment. We're going to need those keys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to grab the ink, too.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And rifle through the papers on the desk.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now, I'm sure it goes without saying that once you leave this place, if you yell, or act a fool in any way, we will tear you asunder before you can say "Ow."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I understand."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you still look like him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, wait, wait. Is this your office?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is my office, yeah."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: These people will know this is your office?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The few that I work with, yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Got it. Thank you. (southern accent) I mean, got it, thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Caleb, did you find anything?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know, did I find anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja, okay. Ooh, ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rest of it doesn't seem to make much sense or pertain to anything important to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jorge. Sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Go ahead. No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are any of these-- (southern accent) Are any of these letters written by you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A few of them." He points to a couple.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to take one and study it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you right-handed or left-handed?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, now he's right-handed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But two hours ago, were you right-handed or left-handed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I was left-handed."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a bitch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He'll never play piano.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, I'm left-handed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm looking for anywhere where there might be a secret stash or something that looks off-kilter or a little odd in here, somewhere where he might be hiding something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Six. No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks like an office.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you guys think? I feel like I need to partake on this voyage today. Don't you think?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hmm.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Almost ASAFP? Right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The weather's kind.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was a nice day earlier.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Seize the moment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Walk him out and make sure that he gets on the boat?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You want to do that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I got to write some shit in this office, but it's up to y'all.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe Beau and myself could go?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe our tortle friend here can leave a little note in your stead, says that you're moving on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's fine."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are there any favorite buzzwords of yours? Something that would sound like you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do you normally sign letters?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughing) A lodestar.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you a "Sincerely" person, or a "Love," "Love, Algar?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His stare is far off in the distance. He is looking down the barrel of a gun and a complete shift in his life that he wasn't expecting to take immediately. His responses are very one-word and very, "No."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shouldn't have been a dick.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, all right. I'm sure it's probably a "Sincerely."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's very sad. So sad that he had to sit down and write a letter about how he had to leave the city and how he had to free the creature beneath the city because it was so wrong--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't tell him all those things. I totally plan on doing that shit. Get out of here before talking about--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's leaving.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (teeth clenched) Get out!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, we'll go. We'll meet up with you guys?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we'll see you back at the (mumble).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, tortle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You escort him to the wharf. As a sailor, you know specifically who to talk to to secure passage under the table. Where do you want to send him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know anything about the outside world. Where's far?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was joking, I said Glintshore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) It's a good summer stay-away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Lay out on the glass.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Somewhere in Tal'Dorei.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Marquet is far. It's very far.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I heard a traveler talking about Whitestone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't think it has a shore.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know, I just heard about it. I don't know anything about it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's Stilben. Which was on the coast?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that's one of the major coastal cities on the eastern side of Tal'Dorei.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I hear Opash has a sweet Airbnb on an island.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's send him to Marquet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Marquet! Marquet it is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's where Adella's going.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Because it's a longer journey, it's a little more expensive, but you can secure passage for him to Marquet for, we'll say, 20 gold.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll sponsor that journey.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Want to give him a little spending cash? Make sure he's not completely destitute when he gets there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That seems nice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did we take the money that was on him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I may have taken the money that was on him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You want to put back one of those platinums?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. Here you go, Jorge. Here's one platinum.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is very kind of you."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The beard's peeling a little bit. He's just staring at the coin in his palm.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let me get that part. (slap)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: God, we're mean.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He was a bad person. We didn't kill him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, you let him live. That's really nice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks, Deuce.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to try and take him to Adella or just any boat?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Any boat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Adella leaves in little under a week. You can secure passage today on a small ship that's heading back to Marquet. You send him off on his way. You wait another hour or so to make sure the ship disembarks and he doesn't abscond from the ship itself. You watch as it begins to make its way towards the horizon and you feel confident that he's not going to be coming back anytime soon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That ring of keys that he gave us: approximately how many keys are on that thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I need to write a letter about-- okay, what should I say? "I hate this city, I want everyone "to suffer what I feel in my heart?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "I'm sick of you people pushing me around--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "I'm sick of all you people pushing me around, I'm freeing this djinn and I'm setting sail for another land." How about all of that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "It'll be very smart to kill me on sight." (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's probably good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's maybe-- it's gilding the lily, perhaps.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, well. What if I just write "Ha ha ha, I'm so glad you guys are going to suffer, I got "away scot free."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Lots of middle fingers, you'll never catch me alive, your city is shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "I'm going to burn all of my fellow guards with a large Fireball first." (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We can take care of the guards.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're going find some charred bodies and stuff--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If the djinn got away, then maybe the djinn did it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A water creature?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How'd that fire happen, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here's a question. Did you dismiss your specter, or do you have a--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I didn't dismiss it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's just running around in terror.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're leaving the area, right behind you is this (ghostly groaning). What do you do with it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You mean as we go outside outside?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It's following you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Go back inside the room!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys begin to watch as that same drowned specter is now coming back behind you (groaning)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god! I Turn Undead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It turns right around and runs off a bit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait. Turn Undead really just turns an undead around?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. It's Turn Undead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's frightened of him and runs away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's like a remote control car that spins.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Unless you're high enough level, and then it (pop).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not quite at the pop-it. It's too strong for me to pop, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. It doesn't last a long while. A short time passes and it just--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I'm writing this letter? And I'm leaving it in his office, yeah?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah we're still in the office, are we not?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Technically we left. You three are here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While Jester is writing, I would like to flip this office for anything of value.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You already have.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, just the papers?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you checked around for anything that would be interesting, so--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Excellent.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I have a thought.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What if he accidentally lost control of the creature and then ran--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groaning noises)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How many Channel Divinities can you do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I might be out. I was about to say-- don't I have-- I might be out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah, no, I'm out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we have two Channel Divinities or just one at this level? Then I Turn Undead!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Turns around and starts walking away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I really feel like you could do something about this!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe he ran away because doesn't want to be held accountable for his actions?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's true. What do you guys think? Okay. Deuce has a really good idea. Maybe instead of we say, "Go fuck yourself," and all of that, what if we say-- It's really strong, we have this version of his letter right here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Draft number two.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Draft number two. "Oh no, I lost control of the genie, and now I am so scared I'm running away."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He strikes me as the sort of person who doesn't want to be held responsible--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you were fleeing in terror, would you stop to write a letter?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That might be his attempt to say, "I did this, I'm sorry, bye" kind of thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Remember, we don't want anybody to like him when he comes back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, they're not, there are people dead down there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (ghostly groaning) The specter returns as you guys are having this conversation.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ah! I can't do anything! I try to attack it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Go ahead and make an attack roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll Sacred Flame him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you guys remember in Tomb Raider 2 the butler that you had?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's 12, so it takes damage. That's basically what this is!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! That's 11. 11 radiant damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (impact, groaning)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god, Sacred Flame.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Success.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Three points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not attacking anyone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it's not?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (ghostly groaning)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It disperses into shadow and vanishes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're time jumping.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me and Marisha are took Jorge to the docks with the promise that Fjord would come later and join us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But he was the one that had all the sailor tricks to get the boat!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This was me realizing that this is what would have happened earlier, so we're taking care of it now. Okay? Because this would have been following-- I forgot about the specter briefly earlier, and this would have happened.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like that just takes responsibility for everything that happened down there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like it better when he's saying, "Fuck yourself."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that's fair, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I appreciate that they've completely glossed over this scenario.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's very fair, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we should stick with the go-fuck-yourself version and say "I intentionally--" he intentionally let him go, and he knew that he was going to fuck over the city and run.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I agree with you, Jester, I think we should stick with "Go fuck yourself."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Sincerely--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, I don't know if I'm really here right now, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say that you guys are all together.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, that sounds good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Christ, it's a letter; just fucking write it and send it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm leaving it in the office, Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe something like, choke upon your woe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Choke upon your woe!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or eat fecal matters.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll for your forgery kit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With proficiency.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With proficiency, so d20 plus-- I'll say this is for intelligence--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want to look at the dodecahedron first?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah! I do, I do!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Before you write this letter, let's time jump again. Before you write the letter--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I focus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you have a fragment of possibility.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Depending on how I roll, I can roll again?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Take a hit of the dodec.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh! That's dexterity plus proficiency?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm saying, because it's a forgery and it's having to pay attention to details, I'm going to say intellect. Intelligence.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you roll twice?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I didn't roll twice. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't have to roll twice. You don't have to spend it if you don't want it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Proficiency bonus is just your initiative? Where's your proficiency?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus three, I think?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22. Pretty good forgery. You're proud of yourself. It looks pretty spot-on based on his handwriting. You've followed his cadence, his sentence structure. His signature looks incredible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The dicks look like his dicks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm impressed by the dicks, actually.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you, thank you. All right, I'm leaving this on his desk.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should you put it on the door with like a dagger?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With his dagger.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With his-- I left his dagger. Shit. I could go back down the hall and get it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. I'll just maybe tape it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have extra daggers, do you want a dagger? I have three extra daggers.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, he had a quill, didn't he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With a quill!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah! Through the paper.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say with your strength you can easily do so. It will break the quill, technically, but it still pierces it to the door. There you go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Angry writer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's pretty threatening, it's a feather.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cool, so the letter is complete and placed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we go down and escape the other way so nobody sees-- Oh, I guess you guys already left.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We already left. We're taking Jorge to the docks, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, we're all back together now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did we go to the docks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, we're-- Okay. This is my fault for forgetting one feature earlier and trying to fit it into the narrative here. Order of business! You arrived, you forged a letter--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We forged it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You saw a weird undead thing again that was following you and then Fjord made it go away with a hand wave. You then took Jorge to the docks and sent him on his way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great! Now where are we? On the docks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are near the docks, you've made your way out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do we do with Jorge? I'm kidding! (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I feel like that kind of went about as well as it could have.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think I should go get the boat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to head towards where we anchored the boat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It's still there floating. You can see there's one fisherman who's eyeing it curiously.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to cast Calm Emotions on myself and go swim to the boat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You go ahead and make your way out, get up on the side of it, and begin to row yourself back to the edge of the dock. There, not far away, is the old fisherman you had spoken to earlier that you had borrowed it from. You gather your things out of it and he comes over and is like, "Well, I appreciate you bringing this back."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's no problem. I think I've had enough ocean for a while. That was--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No such thing. No such thing!'"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Have a good day!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You too, tall one."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do we do now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn around and I look at the city. Do I notice... commerce? Does it look like things are slowing down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we now Bane?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's terrible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like the city. I mean, at this point in the day, it's getting a little later. The sky is starting to get a bit-- maybe the oranges of dusk are starting to peek in a little bit. You maybe have another hour or so of daylight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I see Merpol anywhere?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: See who?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently, no. You don't see him anywhere.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank god. All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could go to that tower and investigate it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We could do both.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll admit, I'm a little tired.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was a lot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We also wanted to check in to... Did we want to try and be at the docks at midnight?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, to meet Marius?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes. He hangs out at the docks at midnight, and does Marius know Sabian and Cadmus?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's unclear at this point, isn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you have that letter, by the way? Who has that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The letter?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The letter that mentions Marius LePual.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is he there every midnight or just tonight midnight?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because if we wait until tomorrow, I can Zone of Truth him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Orly said he likes to hang out around the docks at midnight to look for work or something.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb would've remembered that, too. I don't, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. I mean, occasionally he's out there looking for work. That's as much as Orly knew.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sabian was?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Marius.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sabian we've heard about through Orly, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, Sabian you heard about through Fjord.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Through what?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, but didn't we talk to like Captain Adella and someone else? Someone gave us the news--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got some information about Sabian, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That they were doing the Widow's Embrace thing and that they're pirates.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that was through Captain Adella.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was through Adella, okay. Okay, okay, okay, sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's make our way back towards the-- (under his breath) Jesus Christ.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Lavish Chateau.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. I've got to take more organized notes. Maybe we can stop by the fancy tower on the way back?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am very interested in that tower, but I would love to ask some more questions around town before assailing it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure. About what time is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's close to dusk. About an hour of daylight left.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, you said that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we go towards the Lavish Chateau?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, let's go tell Mama what we did!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll go to the Lavish Chateau and we'll just walk by the tower on our way back to give it another look-see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It's a little bit of a roundabout walk, but you can do it. All right, so you make your way back to the Open Quay. Heading towards the tower, you can see, as you approach, based on whatever illusory enchantment finds your vision, you can see as it seems to grow the closer you get to it, to the point where it's massively towering when you're right below it. Still no sign of a door, at first glance. You still have the 20-foot-up or so balcony and a few other windows up that way. You can see the top two windows have, now that it's gotten darker, you can there's a little bit of a firelight glow at the very top of it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Have I ever read about anything like this? A building that seems to shift in size.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an arcana check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I look around and see if the city seems like it's being affected at all by the no power?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten? You assume it's either some sort of spatial enchantment to it, or it's an illusion, maybe. That's as much as you can make out from it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural 20. The city doesn't appear to be heavily changed by any means--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do notice that, where previously there were some plumes of white smoke or steam that rose from certain, more industrial aspects of the city, are much thinner, appearing to be more residual columns of steam and smoke.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh God, oh God, oh God.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll be fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No bigs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anything you want to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm tapped. I can't do anything.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You boys just wanted to come look at the tower again because you like it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't look at me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, kind of. We wanted to see if it changed, or if anything's different, or if we see a mysterious figure in a window.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's no windows.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It doesn't bother you that it grows taller as you get closer?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's pretty freaky.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No doors.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, it's fascinating. We learned that whoever owns this place owns the district, isn't that correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So someone in this district probably knows something about the person who owns the district.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's Yussa Errennis, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yussa Errennis.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, Caleb!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You memorized the map of the underground pathways, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do any of them run under this tower?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, there was no marking for a tower.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Using your spatial, Beautiful Mind techniques.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intelligence check to see if you can overlay the memory of the sketch you saw with the location in the Quay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just raw intelligence?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is a 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16. You feel like you've been able to take the two and map them together pretty well. Nothing passes directly beneath the tower, no. The Sluice isn't a wide network. It's a handful of deliberately placed tunnels to make their way towards specific parts of different districts.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That diagram wasn't elaborate enough for me to know the answer to that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Let's go to the Lavish Chateau?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. By the time you make it to the Lavish Chateau, it is sunset. The last bit of light that vanishes over the horizon far over the ocean, the Lucidian Ocean in the distance. You make your way to the interior, where a number of folks have finally gathered. Maybe a handful, six or seven people, are already in there enjoying meals, having drinks. You know that there isn't a performance tonight, but people are in there enjoying the relatively, comparably classy atmosphere, as the familiar band plays their music. What do you want to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I also used another Disguise Self spell to make sure I stay--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good call.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tortley.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we just here to see your mom?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, probably should tell her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I spiffed up my clothing again, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do we get upstairs with you all tortley?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just go upstairs.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Let's go upstairs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I go upstairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys make your way up to the third flight. You missed him last time, but you come upon the familiar sight, to you, which was your mother's personal bodyguard for half of the time at the Chateau, Bluude.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bluude!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which was also responsible at times to watch you and escort you when you went to the city. The rest of you are caught off-guard by the sight of this massive, dual-horned minotaur.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wearing a very, very fine shirt, but is Donald Ducking it the rest of the way. Thankfully, relatively thick, thick fur down there. You'd have to pry to get a good look. But is standing there, arms crossed, and goes, "Oh, Jester!" He comes over and picks you up... Actually, no, he wouldn't recognize you because you're a tortle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Doesn't he know that I am Jester, still?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably not. Not unless you say anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bluude, it's me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now we go into the "Oh, Jester!" There we go, that's the moment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My tortle eyebrows are going like this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This one's name is Bluute?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: His name is Bluude.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not Bluute, but Bluude?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a D.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With a D, okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're here to see Mama.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hello?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi! Do you have company?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not at the moment, no."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we come in and talk to you for just a second?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, Jester! Hi! Yeah, please, do come inside, everyone. Come on." You all make your way into the chamber.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll drop the disguise spell once we're inside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. She shoos out her servants, and the door closes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! This is Yasha. Has she met Yasha?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) This is Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is no performance tonight, I apologize, but if you would like us to provide food for you or whatever you like, please, do not bother to let me know."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, you know that guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There are a number of guys that I know, yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The guy that was bugging you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Algar, yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We went to go talk to him, but he had already left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He left?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Things happened, they were real bad or something, I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Huh. Well, that may very well be a great turn of luck in my benefit, definitely. Thank you for looking into that."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course! Yeah, we were going to talk to him and everything, but he is gone, so...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: " Well... that makes me feel more comfortable, thank you very much."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I appreciate it."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you guys want to eat anything? (sounds of agreement)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well! I will ensure that you are all properly taken care of this night." (clapping twice) She goes ahead and brings the servants back in. A meal is placed for the rest of you, and as the evening progresses, and you take a bit of time to rest--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like a short rest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, go ahead and take a short rest. You guys manage to enjoy probably one of the better meals you've had in a while.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jester, why did you lie to your mom?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is my mom still in this room?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're whispering, she can't hear us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look, here's the thing--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are eating downstairs. They're not bringing room service up into her chambers.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, so we're no longer with Marion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not at the moment, no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look, I don't want her getting in trouble for anything that happened.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why would she get in trouble? We did it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know! The less she knows, the better! What if she found out something and she judged me for it because we did something bad?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if she finds out you lied to her and judges you for that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She won't. Why would she find out?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, I had the same thought. Really, either she believes Jester and no big deal, or she doesn't believe Jester and knows that it's taken care of.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You should never lie to your mother.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I usually don't. It's just to protect her. It is a white lie.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear the heavy footfalls of Bluude making his way down the stairs and goes and finds a corner just to keep an eye. Then Marion, now dressed in her casual evening gown, which in itself is still regal and beautiful and trails behind her up the stairs as she descends, comes to join you at the table and sits. She smiles at the rest of you and gives a renewed nod to Yasha, whom she just met. "Well, I am very happy to see that you've made a good group of friends, a travel family. Just warms my heart."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Is everything all right?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, is it bad? What did I do? Was it bad?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You didn't do anything. No, this is very good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jester feels like that perhaps she is imposing, bringing all of us here, and we are trying to convince her that that is silly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not in the slightest! Jester, this is no imposition. I'm just happy to have you home for a bit."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm happy to be home for a bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How long do you intend to stay?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, well, I don't know. We're here for Fjord, really, so it's up to him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's not true, this is your home! It's where you're from.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Weren't you trying to find out about the guys?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we have time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fjord swallowed a ball, and it's inside of him now, and he doesn't know what's going on, so--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to tell the truth about that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have a friend who had a similar problem years ago. If you would like, there is a physician we could have take a look at you and see if we can a way to no longer have that problem?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh man, I want to hear that story.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would be glad to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mama, it's not that kind of ball he swallowed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You had a friend that swallowed a stone?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've been curious for weeks now, almost months-- I think it's been almost months-- what she was like as a child, because she's such a joy now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ah, young Jester was rambunctious, curious, ever running off, getting into, well, trouble, and finding trouble, making trouble. For me, it was a joy. She was very quick to learn, ever smiling, brightening any chamber she walked into. She had a good sense for who needed to be taken down a peg."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So she was always a prankster.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very much so, more so around adolescence, I think."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I guess so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But she has always been sweet, inspirational--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Very sweet, see? I am very sweet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very proud of her."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have any good embarrassing stories?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes but not anything I can speak of in mixed company."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we in mixed company?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are in the downstairs, in the main tavern area of the Chateau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't get to come down here very much and eat with you. It's nice to be able to be here now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I agree."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (dice hit the table)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want to borrow my mask?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no. I have that other mask that I bought.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What mask?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Remember the metal mask, that I bought when I was with you? I'm going to put it on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's good dinner wear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a big old cast iron tiki mask with giant tusks, oof. All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With tiefling horns and tail coming out of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Curious choice, but I understand probably for the best. There is not much of a mouth hole, so eating is going to be very difficult." Takes a little spoon and is like, "All right, here we go try to make it-- there it is. Perfect." You guys talk for a bit. She shares some embarrassing stories of Jester's childhood. Asks each of you a little bit about your story, and we'll say for the better part of the evening, it's an enjoyable respite from the chaos of the day and the chaos of the journey. Your blink dog has dried, as has your weasel.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh yeah! Can I go check on Professor Thaddeus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, and as you go ahead and find-- there is a coat room, essentially, where the young man who had originally met you when you got there is inside. You can see him sitting in the back on a stool going like this. He's staring in the far way, and there's a coat rack where Professor Thaddeus is sitting on there, staring at him. As you enter the chamber--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, hey."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is my bird okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see there's some scratches on his cheek. "Yeah, he's fine. Just watching him right there."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Uh-huh. You didn't traumatize him, did you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think not? Hard to feed these.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thaddeus?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll an animal handling check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck me. Fucking animals. Why did I do this? Oh no. Six. Fuck that die.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "I'm going to have an owl!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He dives towards you and goes right over your shoulder and is now in the middle of the central tavern. (fluttering) The leather cord of his leash is now dangling as he's up in the rafters (hooting).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can't control him, you guys. He has a mind of his own. He's a free person.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone in the chamber's like-- there're people that are eating who are like, "What the--?" They're all staring up at this owl that has now found a brief perch up into the roof chamber.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, you've all seen an owl before, shut up!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think they're worried about the-- (whistles)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It'll be fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb summons Frumpkin the octopus and I rub his head like a Bond villain, staring at Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Squeaks like a balloon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to pull one of the beetles out of my staff and say, "Professor, you want a snack?" I hold it up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're holding the beetle?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an animal handling check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy, there goes your finger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually, it dives down, snatches and-- a little prick on the finger from one of the talons-- but, eventually, makes a quick meal and heads back up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What happens if we have to leave and the bird is still here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can climb up. Yeah, you're a monk, you can climb up to the ceiling. Hey, Mama?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes?"

lines.name: LAURA
