lines.text: Will you watch my puppy? Well, it's me and Beau's puppy, really.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Will you watch our puppy while we go out tonight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course. To be honest, I've been thinking about maybe having a pet, so this will be good training."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, since you've been gone, you know."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How do you feel about owls?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And a weasel?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They're interesting, definitely."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you good with puppies? Because this one's kind of special.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I imagine that it is-- how is it special? This sounds like a warning."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) This sounds like a warning.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nugget. Poof!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Lift off your mask.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, thank you. Nugget, it's me. Poof!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (poof) It appears on your chest and catch it for a second. She's like, "Oh my."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He blinks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is as tricky as, perhaps, the daughter that I have."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aww. I'm going to tell Nugget to look at my Mama and say, blink to her right now, okay, for as long as we tell you to. That's home.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (panting)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mama, tell him you're home.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're home."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, tell him you are home. You are his home.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh. I am your home."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good, here. Be careful, he pees on things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Immediately, she goes, "Heh," and pets him over the table.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You got rid of a dog, that's great!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't get rid of him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but we don't have to have him anymore, so that's good, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's still our dog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Perhaps Nugget could live here and you could visit him when you come home.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The weasel and the owl?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, the weasel's staying with me. I know, it's such a temptation.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know, I want to eat that weasel so bad!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we going to go down to the docks?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. Is it almost midnight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's getting close. About 11, 11:20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I try-- Professor Thaddeus! You want to come?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make one more animal handling check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh, that's a natural 19. 22.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: See? He responds when you talk sternly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah! Fucking--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually, seeing this command-- (flapping) comes to rest onto your wrist.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (excited breathing) I mean, that's fucking right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Third time's the charm.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He likes cursing, I guess.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is he coming with?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's coming with us to the docks, I guess.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, yep. Good. We're inconspicuous with a big fucking horned owl on your arm.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, we're trying to be inconspicuous?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it's fine. It'll be great. He'll be fine, he can see in the dark.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right? Exactly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can get you a tree costume, you'll fit right in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're fucking Hermione Granger up in this shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She had a cat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I put my hood up. I take the mask off, but I put my hood up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys make your way through the streets heading towards where?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know. The docks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, well, there's the Restless Wharf and there's the Open Quay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We were told maybe one of those?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The place that you had heard this information--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did Orly say specific docks?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was the Open Quay right? Was where he wanders at midnight?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We were at the Wayfarer's Cove. Which is in the Restless Wharf.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You didn't get any specifics, he just said near the docks, but you were in the Restless Wharf when you got this information.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes. Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Who's helming a lookout?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll do that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I put up my hood as well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've got lamplight on the streets to varying degree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's no one doing any sort of evening work on these ships at this hour. You see a handful of zhelezo patrolling up and down the sides of the dock doing their rounds, no urgency or direction necessarily. Make a perception check, if you don't mind, Clay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26, jesus! Okay then. You--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wise as fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch out for one of the westernmost docks of the district to see a shady figure darting between patrols. Watching as the zhelezo will pass and then use that moment to dart across the street and wait for the next zhelezo to pass and then make their way over to the edge of the wharf. You see them now ducking near a stack of empty shipping crates and they wait, every now and then glancing over when a zhelezo's not nearby or looking towards one of the darkened ships that is anchored towards one of the dock extensions, not that far from one of the docking cranes that's left still after an evening of offloading from one of the other ships.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hmm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you see?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, it's pretty quiet. Other than that guy hiding over there by the shipping crates, there's really nothing to see.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is he blond? Is he a blond half-elf?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's really dark. I don't know. Other than that, there's nothing really happening.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's a guy darting.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should I go dart after him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we playing darts?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, do you want-- Blessing of the Trickster!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah! What does that do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It gives you advantage on stealth checks!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, great.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Episode 30 something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do watch as a zhelezo holding one of their portable torches and a sheathed sword glances over in the direction of where that shaded figure is. Steps towards it and holds the torch up and begins a soft call out. "Hello?" The shaded figure stands up and approaches, hands open, smiling. Getting a better look, you do see finer elven features, a lighter, ashy hair that's short on the sides and flopped in the front who approaches, talks briefly. You can't really hear what they're saying, it's hushed, but puts something into the hands of the zhelezo. The zhelezo takes a moment, nods and then turns around and leaves his post.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's really useful information.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The figure goes and then darts back behind the crates once more and keeps looking over towards that one single ship that's about 35 or 40 feet from where he's sitting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wonder what he's waiting for.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Looks like someone that's waiting for a handoff if I've seen them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wonder how much he paid to bribe the guard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Apparently five gold is a great going rate.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's true. That's what we did.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Huh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seeing as there's no guard, I'm going to dart over towards where he's hiding, but not right on him or anything, across the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a stealth check with advantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, that's a one. That's slightly better.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh, that's right!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stealth? 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You make your way over to the side of the docks on the opposite end and there's a little step up from this edge of the street and you have a few buildings begin to give way. The road ends and there are bits of it that break off and fall off the short cliffs into the water. There's the docking crane to your left on a bigger piece of the dock that's out of the way, but it's blocking a lot of the view on this side. The ship that this figure is focused on and the crates that he's by on one side. You get to the other and keeping quiet. You don't think you've been noticed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mm-hmm. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Perception check. Nine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh. Nine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're waiting. Not much else seems to be going on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (nervous chuckle) Great. Well, I'm ready. For anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You just sit there and wait?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The rest of you doing anything?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. While all that was happening I'm halfway through, as a ritual spell, casting Find Familiar so I can change Frumpkin to something else.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll tell you in a minute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one by that ship the light flickers out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Motherfuckers.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, that's a thing. You guys see that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't see that, and you're not close enough to hear any of this. You see as a handful of figures seemed to have come out of that ship, walked across the gangplank and put that torchlight out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think something's happening.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do the figures look like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check for you if you want to glance, or are you asking Caduceus?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to look.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pass that 26.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (phone beeping)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorry, Laura.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I got a 14. I can't really tell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hoods up. Not uniform. Patchwork in color and make, but they're all obscuring their features intentionally.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They look like pirates.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should we go out and tell them we're bearing gifts and shit?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was just thinking that. I think maybe a little bit of familiarity with some underground might help the situation.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Tell them we're bearing gifts and we want to see the captain, see what happens?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I'll go with you on that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott, you watch as the figure that's waiting stands up, out of the spot, looks around, looks that there's no zhelezo currently patrolling at the moment and begins now to step onto the dock and walk towards the figures on the ship.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. I will trail behind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Goes and approaches. The figures, there's now two that have stepped up to meet and you can see now there are a few more that are still in the ship that are watching from--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How big is this ship? Is it like a ship or like--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a fair size. I'd say from tip to end, it's about 50 or so feet. Single sail, but a big sail.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Any iconography on the sail?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's currently furled up. It looks like it's a ship that's designed for speed more than cargo, but it's a decent-sized ship.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The layout of the dock, is the front of the ship near the dock? Is it pulled up? Is it parallel parked?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a smaller fishing ship on one side, there's a rowboat that's set off in the water there. It's facing towards you at an angle and is currently anchored at the edge of where the dock turns to the right. There is a gangplank set out between that and the dock where the figures are stepping up. They're meeting right where that gangplank is and where that torch was snuffed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, Fjord? You've got that fancy armor that helps you float. Do you think maybe you could get underneath the docks? Overhear something?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I like that. I'll run and-- staying a good distance in-- I'll drop off the docks under the water and start swimming.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: SEAL team.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Go ahead and make a-- How do I want to do this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's your autobiography title!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. I walked into that one. Make an acrobatics check for me, Fjord.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No splash, no splash! Ten points!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (splashing) The figures all of a sudden all stop and turn, as well as the one who was talking, and they all look in your direction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I use Thaumaturgy to make a dolphin sound.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, yes! Yes, queen, yes!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Night dolphins!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (dolphin chittering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thaumaturgy-- it's not so much an audio mimicry spell, but you can make certain sounds happen, so I'll say roll a performance check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aww, seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It seems to not assuage their fears and more make them more worried and curious as to what's happening. You watch as the two figures there start looking over towards the initial figure that you were following and are looking really aggressive towards them. The figure's hands are up and are like-- (stammering). There's this heated conversation going. The figures in the ship are getting things at the ready that you can't see, but it looks like they are very much on guard. The two that were talking, one of them grabs the scruff of the figure and holds him there, while the other one, blade drawn, begins to approach the edge of the dock where that noise came from.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn to Caleb and I go: There! I threw our engagement ring and our life and I fed it to the rabies dolphins! It's over, okay?! It's over!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like that your ring made a (loud splashing).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check with disadvantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because Caleb is on the ground going--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Deception with disadvantage. Okay, 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you give this display, the figure with the sword out that was looking for the edge of the water where Fjord was looks over at you and goes-- with the little bit of features you can see a chin, a scruffy beard poking out beneath the hood, still with the blade there, turns back, gives a hand motion towards the ship.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I didn't even ask: how far is the water from the fucking dock? Five feet, or like 15 feet? Is it a tall dock?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, it's about ten foot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Sweet, I can't even get out of this water if I wanted to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can climb up on the cliff if you need to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, has ten minutes gone by?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. When you started this, everyone was going into the-- you're maybe three minutes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You didn't correct me, but I said while Nott was foofing around, so some time passed. Five, ten didn't, but you're the DM.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: While this is all going on, I'm going to cast Message and send it to Caleb and say: There's something in the water! There's some argument happening. Something's going horribly wrong, Caleb. We should get out of here! You can respond to this message.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My mom was right! I never should have gotten involved with you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know that I am so close to the end of the spell and I am going to push through.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (Tracy voice) Look, this is why! Every time I try to talk to you, you play with your toys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The figure gets within 15 feet of where you're standing and says, "Hey! Piss off!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, you know what? You piss off, okay? I've had a rough day. I just wanted to be by myself near the ocean!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Closes his fist. Three arrows get loosed from the ship in your direction. That's a 14 to hit. Misses, I believe? That's a 19 to hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And another 19.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Run away, Tracy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispering) Never.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is seven points of damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to Deflect Missiles.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do I have to roll for that? Hang on, sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's 1d10 plus your monk level, isn't it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's reaction, damage minus 1d10 plus my monk level. It just happens, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you roll a d10 plus your monk level.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, but my monk level is--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, so I'm good. I'm going to spend a ki point to send it back at this guy. Yeah, this is happening.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I love that she was having a fight with her boyfriend with a giant owl on her shoulder.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's my rock. He's the only one who understands me. Okay, I'm attacking. Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ooh, okay. Roll a d6 plus--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought I got a d10. It's whatever the bolt is, back at him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, the arrow is a d6 plus your dexterity modifier.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Plus my dex?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I believe it's-- let me check the rules real fast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Weapon damage, plus my dex.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's a d6 plus your dex.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven points of damage. You send one back, you hear (pained grunt), but at a pretty decent distance. The other one that hit you, that's eight points of damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Deflect Missiles.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a second ki point you spent.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it's only a ki point when I send it back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, but you've already used one reaction, so you have to spend another ki point to get an additional reaction.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Got you. I will do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you get ki points on short rests?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, I do. It was seven damage, you said?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight points.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take one point of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One point of piercing damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to spend another ki point to send this one back, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ah! Eight damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is this to the guy that already took an arrow, or to another? Because there were three of them that fired at you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Two at the guy who's closest to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The same guy gets hit by both arrows. At this point, the guy who had given the order sees you do this and his hand comes down, gives a quick shout over his shoulder, "Come on! Take them out, "they've seen too much!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It didn't work.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Matt, before you run off for the thing, can you describe as Caleb shakes his head out of what he was doing, what do I see? I haven't paid attention to any of that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what I'm about to show you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's going to all be in front of me? I love this game.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's as if he knew that this would go horribly wrong.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That this was going to be bad. Sorry, guys. Sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm disappointed in us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For what?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was the most flounder-fucky sneak up ever.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Belly-flop, shitty dolphin, Masterpiece Theatre.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We had bad rolls on important things!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whoa! Holy fuck, this is the best map you've ever made!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All worth it now!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, it's so cool.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is the figure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I feel like it's a misty night. It feels like a misty night, don't you think?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, I think we're all right. So you guys were-- Actually you should be a little further back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It feels like we should have figured this out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I assume Find Familiar has fizzled?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should have walked up and said, "We've come bearing gifts. Where is the captain?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was the first idea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was. Things started moving quickly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, man, this is so cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is so badass!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hope they don't kill Marius.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We could grab Marius and try and get the fuck out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a good thing we rested up and waited until the following night, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, right? So good!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus, Jester. Nott, you would have been hiding off to the other side of the dock here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, look at me, well-positioned.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus, Jester?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Were we down over there, or--?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, hiding next to a building or something. Crouching down, observing, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're keeping out of sight, best you can, to watch this. Yasha-- whoever wants to run Yasha-- is going to be with you guys as well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we have an iPad for that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We will, because we're going to take a break before we jump into this, because it's nine o'clock. That'll give you guys a moment to figure your shit out. We'll be right back, here. For this giveaway, while we're gone, by Wyrmwood, we have here the-- oh, it's cherry wood! There's this nice little cherry wood piece here with the eastern sea of the Euphoros Peninsula, drawn by our awesome friend Deven Rue. This is the full dice tower and little dice box set. This will be going to one of you lucky winners out there. To enter this tonight-- where did I put the sheet of paper? There it is. Somewhere in the vicinity. (laughs) I was prepared and then it went away. Well, if I recall--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Code word?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Spraying_mantis, congratulations, we'll get your information and get your Wyrmwood victorious gift out to you ASAP.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Spraying_mantis would fit in at our table.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. I need you all to roll initiative, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Initiative! Roll for initiative!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I roll for Yasha, too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, if you don't mind.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will roll. (shouting) No! No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'd better roll for Laura.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You roll for Laura, because I shouldn't.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to add my boots.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What'd you roll for you? All right, starting at the top. 25 to 20?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I rolled a natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) Yasha rolled a two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Classic Ashley.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is weird.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 to 20? He's the only one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm the only 20?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. 20 to 15?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 16 here as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. 15 to ten?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Zwölf. 12.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is Sparta!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Madness!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we'll see real fast.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did Yasha roll, again?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two, plus whatever her initiative bonus is, which I don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You, then Yasha?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was about to say, we don't have her iPad.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll just make her last.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say it's a plus... let's say a plus seven to hit. You know the rules for rage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll go with that. She does an additional... You should probably pull up the stuff. That was something that should've done during the break.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we said we were going to do that during the break.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you did not. Now you don't have Yasha's abilities. That's how it works out. Yasha will be doing some damage, if she gets there. All right, so, top of the round. Fjord, in the middle of this chaos now breaking, the arrows being flung, you are in the water and ten feet below the dock. What're you going to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. I'm going to use my bonus action to use the single charge on Summer's Eve-- doesn't use a spell slot-- to Misty Step from my position in the water up to where Marius is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Isn't Summer's Eve a douche?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, it is. I wasn't going to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Summer's what? What's the name of the sword?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's definitely for when your vajayjay itches.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that's what it is. No, it's Summer's Dance.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's the best broadcast ever.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sponsor us, Summer's Eve!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope, it's Summer's Eve from now on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He smells of lavender and vanilla.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god, amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I love it. What is the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 30 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, I was going to say, the Misty Step, is it on a short rest or a long rest that it gets back?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is every short or long rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gotcha, perfect.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I'll reach out and grab towards Marius and say, come with us, and cast Thunder Step. He has to be willing to come with.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, make a persuasion check with disadvantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah! Because you literally showed up, ruined this whole deal he was about to make.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, Fjordy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a natural one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (groans)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's not willing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fair enough.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is he the redhead there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, he's puffy pants.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does it cancel out the spell or does it still happen and he just doesn't come with?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The spell still happens, he just doesn't come with.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, that didn't work. I will--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you talk to him before you Thunder Step back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He tried.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I did. I rolled a natural one. It was great. He didn't want to come.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is going great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. Par for the fucking course.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On brand.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I make it over to this dock over here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How long is the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 90 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 90 feet? Most likely, yeah. You have to count it out. Yeah, easily, you can make it anywhere on that dock, pretty much.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 90 nautical feet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (counting) Eight points of thunder damage, woo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, it doesn't kill Marius, that's good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so there's this blast, this loud thunderous sound, which may have gotten the attention of a nearby zhelezo or two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh god. Where's the reset button?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where's the save point?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, can we load the latest save file?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we reach in the SNES, push the game up and down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's none in view currently, so you don't know, it could be a while until one of them shows up. You get the sense that that was a loud noise, because it's a Thunder Step. That ends your turn?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah, you can hear it within 300 feet, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. That ends your turn. That brings us now to the bowmen. The bowmen, who--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right here, put me out of my misery.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just vanished out of sight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because I was behind them, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Against Beau, that is--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I try and like self-defense--defend Caleb?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Secret service?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 to hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think I cast Mage Armor before going down to the Sluice, but how much later is it? Is it beyond eight hours?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point it's midnight. You guys went there mid-afternoon, so it's been... Yeah, it's been past eight hours. That is four points of damage to you, Beauregard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Zero points of damage to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Then two attacks against you Caleb.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can't like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both are 15.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I'll cast Shield. So they miss.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both splinter off of you, no issue.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who am I after in the initiative?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are after Beau and Nott, then other characters go, and then your turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to Beau and Nott's turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Take it away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You want to try to take out this guy in front of me first, with your sneak attack, or do you want me to lean in on him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean... this big guy?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The big guy that you're under.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, I can certainly try. I don't want people to see me, but sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I could try to take him out, if you want to try and go for someone else.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Also, Matt, which guy is our guy? The red?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The red.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This guy is Marius.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I shouldn't try anything fancy, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we should get the fuck out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, it's your turn. What are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go up to this guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right here? All right, so you rush up to him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to attack him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Roll for an attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know what to do. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 misses. You punch short. You swing and it hits, but it hits his heavy splint armor and hurts your knuckles a bit, and he takes it. Now that you're up in his face, you can see he's a big, imposing half-orc and currently looks to not feel very threatened by you. That was your first attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hmm, going to try again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We are missing a long rest. We could just get the fuck out of here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, but I don't know what I want to do, though. Waiting for everybody else to run. 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: TRAVIS. 17 just hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, boy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck me, six damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six points of damage, all right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to try to Stunning Strike him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right! That's a 17; 15 plus two on a constitution save. So Stunning Strike, no effect, unfortunately.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cool, supes cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still have your bonus action.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, I do. I'm going to-- I can always disengage and run; I'm fast as fuck-- spend another ki point to do Patient Defense and hold my ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You got it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Everyone else, please run.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to look up above me and-- wait, he doesn't see me yet, I think?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As far as you know, he doesn't see you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so I'm going to scuttle away from him across to that other box over there, across the dock there. And, as I'm running, I'll turn around and fire once at the big guy. Still sneak attack because Marisha's engaged, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is a 24 to hit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That definitely hits. Go ahead and roll sneak attack damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah! (counting) 21 points of damage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 points of damage. You watch as he goes from this arrogant, watching you flounder in front of him as he takes the blows and keeps grinning, suddenly double over as the bolt is now deeply buried into his abdomen. Yeah, that was a pretty tough hit. He's hurt!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: --and hide.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's so cute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Roll a stealth check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Assassin's Creed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's 19. I'm wearing my thing, my hood. Do I get to roll again for stealth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you already get advantage?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Still 19. Yes, you double-advantaged me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What a stupid...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Now you know. All right, that ends your guys' go. It is now the Enforcers' turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Enforcer!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One Enforcer comes out of the center of the ship and looks and sees this going. The guy up top goes, "Quick, burn it all!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This guy is going to go ahead and jump back down into the ship.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They think we're customs and they're going to burn it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That Enforcer's going to pull out a hand crossbow and is going to go ahead and take a shot at you, since you're off in that way. Has disadvantage on the attack, but you're--right now--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He does?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's 15 to hit?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Misses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ricochets off, no issue. That's going to be the end of the Enforcers' turn. Jester, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Am I within 60 feet of this guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look like you're-- it's close.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to step forward a little bit. There, there... sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. (counting) Yeah, he's within 60 feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay I'm going to cast Hold Person at third level on both him and him.

lines.name: MATT, SAM
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. He-- the guy with Marius-- rolls a natural 17. The guy next to Beau rolls a natural three.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, well, he's paralyzed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (singing) Paralyzed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) Para. Para. Paralyzed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are currently concentrating there. The big guy with the bolt in his stomach goes (groans) and his whole body locks up and you can see his eyes go wild as he glances down at you, unable to move at all. Does that finish your turn? You can keep moving the rest of your movement if you want to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to back up and try to get around that building if I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Around here, you mean?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, around the back of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. (counting) 25, 30. That's as far as you can get with your movement. All right, that ends your go. That brings us to Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm casting Catapult at third level.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Food fight! (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He automatically fails his dex save because he is paralyzed. 5d8.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 5d8 fruit damage?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, from lobbing this stack of fruits and heavy wooden boxes into his head.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was a drive-by fruiting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A couple things. 30 points of damage. That's a transmutation spell, so I can shuttle a little bit of arcane energy into my Transmuter's Stone, and I'm going to change its property from dark vision into advantage on concentration checks. I'm going to back the fuck up towards that house, as far as I can go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow. Wizards.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's looking pretty hurt.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This guy's real beefy, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's also taken a rough round. This has not gone well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, but we don't want to fight all of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so Caleb, that ends your turn?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's now the captain's turn... who is paralyzed. His really, really cool round that he was going to do that was going to be really awesome doesn't happen because he's fighting against the spell. He's going to make his save.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why do we have to run? Seems like we're winning.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's more of them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're burning marijuana.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What are they burning, though?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could've found out if we wouldn't have been stupid.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's five people we can see, one dude in the boat down below.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's going to make a wisdom save to see if he can resist the--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's like nine of us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a 12. He did not save. He's still held.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That brings us to Caduceus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh boy, that is a lot happening.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Boil their flesh, Caduceus, let's go. Do it. Bring it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's all taken care of. I'm going to cast a-- Guiding Bolt, I guess?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, towards?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Towards the guy standing next to-- the guy standing next to Marius.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go ahead and make the ranged attack roll. You're casting it at first level?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: First level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, that's a-- what is the ranged attack on that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Guiding Bolt, I think, is 120 feet. I think it's pretty far.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 23 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that'll hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's only wearing leather armor.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ooh! 15 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's not on his last legs or anything, but he's taken some wear and tear.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to vanish.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can do that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a bonus action?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I believe so. I'm double-checking. I can do Hidden Step as a bonus action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So many steps. Misty, hidden, thunder.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to move off in that direction, if that's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Full movement?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's go full movement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There? Okay, there you go. You are not visible at the moment. That finishes Caduceus' turn. Yasha's up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha, seeing all these arrows fly at Beau, she would like to rage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Understood.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She will rush up next to Beau towards the half-orc captain.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sentinel babes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Easy enough to do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Beautiful. She will make-- does she get two attacks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She does. She gets two.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two reckless attacks against the half orc.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, you can. Go for it. She has advantage on him, because he's paralyzed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh! Then we'll make it regular so that he doesn't get advantage back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Doesn't everybody get advantage on attacks against her, too? That would suck with the arrows.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Only the person you attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, reckless, any attacks against you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Any attacks against you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It's been a while since you've been reckless. It's fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Been a while! That's a... 19?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits and that is an auto-crit because he's paralyzed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh. The second one is a 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 does not hit. Unfortunately.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She rolls-- what is it, 2d6, maybe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For her, as a--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's going to carve him like a Thanksgiving turkey.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that's going to be bad for him. This is for the zealot. There we go. The first hit equals 1d6 plus half your-- okay, so it's 2d6 plus six damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The dice are doubled. Plus an additional d6.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 18 plus six is 24, plus an additional d6.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's doubled.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's two. What did I say?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26, I think?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, she just eviscerates him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Man. As he's there, frozen in place, Yasha's rushed up and cleaves right through his chest, and you watch as he folds into two pieces, both tumbling off into the water. There's now two halves of the orc floating in the water below.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "You okay?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow, Yasha. Man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Fjord, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Another layer of insanity.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, it's me?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just fucked my head even more.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know what? Fuck it. I'll use my last spell slot to cast Hypnotic Pattern. I will make it in the shape of the cat's eye sphere above the ship so that everyone can see it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hypnotic Pattern? What is that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's brand new.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that'll get-- you can't get everybody in the ship. You'd be missing either the guy at the front or the guy at the back. Which one do you want to--?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll miss the guy at the back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so the front, then. That's a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes. 15 is the save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 15. 13 plus two. The guy at the front resists. Next guy behind him: natural 16 plus two. He resists. The guy next to Marius fails, and Marius fails. You watch as both Marius and the Enforcer standing on the gangplank, their faces immediately go dull as they stare up at this-- what you see as nothing. You have no visual perspective on what's happening, but suddenly they both go slack-jawed and stand staring up in the air at this empty space.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, they're incapacitated. Their speed is zero. But if they take damage or if someone else uses an action to shake the creature out of their stupor, then they (confused noises).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You just spiked their drinks, basically.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I've bascially Thundercat Ho'd the eye up into the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, kind of. All right, so that's your action?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anything with your movement?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope, I'll come over here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This guy's going to go ahead and shift over and get a bit closer to the edge, and all three of them are going to fire at you, Fjord.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What if we commandeered the ship?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah! Become pirates.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural 20 on the first hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What if we don't commandeer the ship?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 25, 30. I'm within 30 feet of--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Of none of them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: None of them? I've got to be them, not Fjord, right? Okay, never mind. I'll double-check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Double-check that just in case. The next hit against you is 17 plus four.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That hits. 17 is my armor class.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Suffers a critical hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, suffers? You can remove that. Okay, and that's a natural 17 plus four.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This guy's going to duck below over here. They all duck low and they're all going to attempt to hide.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nice. Smart kids.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You watch as they all disappear into the shadows of the ship's deck. You're uncertain where the bowmen are. That brings us to Beau and Nott.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we going in?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I guess?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just try to get Marius out, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm hiding still, so I'm going to pop up and shoot the guy next to Marius.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 to hit? Yeah, that hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it advantage because he's incapacitated?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's advantage to hit, so you can roll twice, sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Same roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it sneak attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because he's not aware that you were there, and you were hidden? Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 20 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice. He immediately breaks out of the stupor, glances over and looks at you, and he's hurt pretty bad. He's glancing over in your direction, looking at the rest of everyone there, seeing how things are shifting. Looking to his ship, he looks like he's planning something. What else are you going to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bonus action. I'll shoot him again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not as good. 17 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 to hit? That still hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. Eight more points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He tumbles forward over and falls into the water.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh man, we might get lucky. Marius!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Marius, no!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no, I shot the wrong guy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Marius is still just standing there in the middle of the gangplank, looking upward, going-- All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How do we get Marius out?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll run towards Marius, but stop around that box.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have a situation?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I was just thinking we could--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's his name? What's the guy-- Orly? Say Orly sent us and try to get out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If Marius is incapacitated.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They don't know that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shake him out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They don't know this ability.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Beau!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to run towards Marius.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. (counting)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have an extra five feet of movement. 45 speed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 45 speed?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, I thought it was 40.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I got that in my extra monk level when I leveled up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (yelling) Oh no, you killed her! (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She slips on some slick dock wood and slides right into him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There we go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking power plants are shutting down--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. You're up on the gangplank with him now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I grab him and tackle him down behind these barrels? Can I try and drag him back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can use your action to grapple, if you want to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make an athletics check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, monk. Come on, M! Aw, you didn't come on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But like, why? Why are my rolls so garbage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you get advantage because he's incapacitated?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I get advantage because he's incapacitated?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's literally just standing there going-- you grab him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just wanted to see you roll!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucker. Okay, I grab him. Can I use my bonus action to try and drag him back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you have a ki point?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do. Can I do Step of the Wind and then fucking move him back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can. You have to pull him back at half speed, but yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. I'm going to come up behind him and grapple him and put my staff around his throat, making eye contact with everybody else.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're friends! (choking)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. I back up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say that knocks him out of his stupor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well. You know, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When you're choking him and forcing to pull him backwards--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, you said grapple.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. But grapple by putting your staff into his throat and pulling him backwards--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's different.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a pretty harsh grapple.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pretty harsh woman.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's a harsh girl.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've pulled Marius back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not a subtle person.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whatever Mama wants, Mama gets.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's my turn. I've got Marius! I've got Marius!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other one is going to step back out from the inside for a second. He's carrying a heavy crossbow that he has winched back. Pulls it up and is going to spin and-- the first person he sees coming out of there is probably going to be you, Beau, because you are the one who's grabbing him and pulling him off the gangplank as he steps out and looks and sees you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I have three-quarters cover? Because I'm using him as a human shield?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say you have half cover because of the boxes that you've pulled up behind. Unless you want to use him as a human shield? That's up to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're here to save you! Oh god! Block his arrow for me!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everyone has to pull their weight, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gets two shots. Natural 20 and a 17, which I don't think hits, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Misses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. That is 20 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I get deflect missiles?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have a reaction still, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes I do. Okay, 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take nine points-- 15?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Five plus my monk level plus dex, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is that how much it reduces it by, total?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just look through our 2000 rules here, wait a second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, that's fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, and it's also a 1d10; I just rolled a 1d8.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, reroll. 1d10 plus your monk level plus your dexterity?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right. See, this is old, but it's-- or is it my proficiency bonus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's monk level and dexterity, you're right. You totally got it, go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm not a crazy person. It's not as good, but 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No sorry, Jester, you're up first, then Caleb.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jester, help.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, you're right. Are you hurting?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I'm just-- I mean, I'm not-- I'm okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess-- this is really hard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Any assistance getting Marius out?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't have anything that's going to help get him out that I can think of.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, if you keep them away, Yasha and I can make it work.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to cast-- fuck. I'll move forward-- well, yeah, to be closer to Beau, and I'm going to cast-- fuck it-- Sanctuary.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On Beau?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (like Laura) Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you resurrect him? (Eeyore voice) I guess.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, Sanctuary on Beau, so anybody that makes an attack against her has to either-- whatever, you know the spell. Then I'm going to-- sorry, that's a bonus action.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Eeyore casts it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, seriously.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (as Eeyore) You know, anyone who tries to kill her can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm freaking out! I don't know what to do!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (as Eeyore) It doesn't matter anyway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (as Eeyore) We're all going to die in the end.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then I'm going to cast Sacred Flame at-- can I see anybody on the boat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, you can see one guy on the boat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess I'm going to try to hit him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the range on Sacred Flame?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 60 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gets a what save? Is it constitution or is it wisdom?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A dex.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, a dex. That would be 13; that's a failure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sacred Flame making it through!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Woo! Six points of damage. Yeah, Hold Person, that was a good one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, it was. That was a good move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's all good. It was a good move.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then I'm going to use the rest of my movement to go back to where I was.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's as far as you go. You used the rest of your movement to get up to that point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your go. Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One is that I see my friend Beauregard getting hammered on by them, which I do not like. Also, I heard some voice from the boat yell out, "Burn "it," so out comes the bat guano and sulfur, and slap, and a beam rockets out, 150-foot range, to about here, and erupts.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please be shipping black powder.

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA
lines.text: (explosions)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're killing everyone on the boat. We don't even know who they are!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who gives a shit? They deserve to die!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is not a moral group by any stretch of the imagination. They're getting better than they used to be, but man.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, Vox Machina is gone. The point is to get it to a range where I know that it's not going to affect them on the dock. It's going to hit the boat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're getting the boat in this, too? All right. Let's do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To get the people, yeah, you've got to get the boat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, absolutely. What am I, a surgeon? I have a 3rd-level spell because I used arcane recovery back at the chateau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Specify that next time, but sure, go for it. I know you would.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I also took a poop while at the chateau, but I thought I didn't--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, that's fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I hope there's nobody important in the bow of the ship.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's so many things that could be going horribly wrong right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. A bunch of refugees wanting safe passage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't worry, Sabian is hanging out below decks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there any way to see what the name of that ship is? Is it on the side of the ship at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'd have to spend an action to look for it. The name would be towards the back, and it's facing away from you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He would've painted that shit on there. I don't see it in there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Everywhere, on every panel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Success, success, and failure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will use my movement to step around the corner of the house and I will begin to count to 20 slowly in Zemnian to calm my nerves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You move behind here. I'm going to roll a saving throw for the ship's sails. Not bad. The sails do not catch fire. They're charred a little bit from underneath, but the ship isn't now suddenly a giant burning torchlight beacon in the middle of the fucking harbor.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know if Caleb is a firebug, or if I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. I respect that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think it's you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey man, if you've got Fireball.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All the human cargo is dead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're still standing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, the slaves that were below deck.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The guy came out and said, "Burn all the slaves"?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, they said, "Burn it all."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, it's 60 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're within range.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's nice; it's eight points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go, eight points to Beau.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to start booking out of here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where're you going?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm heading back around the way I assume everyone else is going. Yeah, that way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha's up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha's going to rush up and aid Beau in trying to pull Marius towards the docks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. If she wants to, she can attempt to grapple and then pull him out of Beau's grip, or we can say she holds her action and then-- it gets a little weird, because it's-- movement is what you pull him out of the way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would it help make full speed when it comes back to Beau's turn if she's assisting? Can they double pull?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can she go, and then I assist on my turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll allow it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I guess do you want me to roll to grapple?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, because he is resisting amongst her grapple as well, and it's harder to do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 15 plus her natural strength.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's going to attempt to break free, now that he's full of mind and he's freaking out. "What's he-- what's going--?" Make an acrobatics check against your athletics. Technically, since you're both grappling, either you or Yasha can make the check, and it's with advantage, I'll say, because you're both holding.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: God, it's an athletics check? What's her athletics?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Strength is plus three and it would be at plus six, probably.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll do mine, since mine's also a plus six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LIAM
lines.text: Get it, girl.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, he almost rolled really high.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh! Those are two bad dice rolls.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 11 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He does still manage to break free! Yay!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Something's going well for Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's going to run.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Motherfucking piece of shit. Why would you do that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seriously? They had a dagger to your throat, you dick.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The ship's on fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ship's not on fire, but he has no reason to trust any of you and was meeting with these people. If he's going to choose between the two, he's going to step into the ship there. He's like, (panting), gets down low, and is hiding. But you know right where he is. That brings us to the top of the round. Fjord, your turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No problem, we got this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fjord pulls out the big guns. Master plan, here it is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. I'm going to run over here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We worked so hard to get him that far.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (counting) I'm going to stand out here and I'll unleash two Eldritch Blasts at this Enforcer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's dressed similarly, but now that you get a better look at this view in the light, he's somebody else. There is still one person down in the ship.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (louder) That's a 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, nice, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, he has leather armor. His AC is 11; he's pretty easy to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 11 points of damage on the first one and ten points of damage on the second, so 22 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ooh, that'll do it. Both blasts take him down. The attrition is not working well in his favor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (inaudible)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't we say that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) Because I'm not up there, and no one else is remembering.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What, that "we come bearing gifts"?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "The Captain" is what we're supposed to say.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It feels like we're really in battle now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus, you do hear-- a ways away, not here yet, but you do hear some voices and footfalls, armored footfalls. You get the sense that zhelezo are on their way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We should probably get out of here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He will say on his turn when he gets there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no, that's right, I'm not there yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bowmen now, who've been hidden below the deck and have endured the Fireball, two of them are going to, from their positions, stand up, and they're going to take shots at you. (arrows firing) They have advantage on both because they were hidden from you. That is a 19 to hit?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Second one, that's cocked. Advantage. That is a 20 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It hits. Punish me for this horrible fucking crap.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They have sneak attack because they were hidden from you. 29 points of piercing damage, from those two hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you still up?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The third goes and unfurls the sail and pulls the rope, and it begins to unroll. A little bit of wind is blowing. It opens up a bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we see the sail? Does it have any markings on it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it is fairly plain. You get the sense that they're now looking for a way to get out of here. Ships aren't the fastest when it comes to exits, but they're trying. That brings us to Beau and Nott.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let them go. What the fuck are we going to do? Run and jump on the goddamn boat?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was about to do that, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the end of their turn, these guys are going to move back as well, and attempt to hide again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, sure, go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? You don't know how many people are on that boat! Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) They rolled really bad. All three of them. At once. A one, a three, and a four.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a shame they never roll that way when they're attacking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's funny. You see them duck down but they're all pulling out their arrow and nocking it into the bow, and you can see exactly where they're hidden. What's the plan, Beau and Nott?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bone it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do what you were going to do. Do it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You go first.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you going to go for the sail? You could go for the sail, potentially.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thought about that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you could start it, I could maybe rip it. I don't know, I'm spitballing here. I don't know what to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make your choices, guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've got two bowmen. Who's the guy in black over there? The Enforcer who came up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the Enforcer's dead. Fjord just blew him up on the side. There's now only three bowmen on the deck, and they're all hurt really badly from the fireball explosion, and they all think they're hidden but they're not.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Go ahead and fuck them up, man. Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll-- shit, I want to use my sneak attack. I will bonus action hide and then, from my hidden position, I will shoot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Move around the side? All right. Against which one?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The guy in black over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Roll for attack, with advantage because he does not see you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, nice. That's a 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that hits, so go ahead and roll damage. With sneak attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was a good roll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that's mean.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 23 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The impact hits him and he falls back and hits the edge of the ship, and then tumbles over and splooshes into the water behind. You hear no noise.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will use any movement to emerge from my hidden position and move up a bit, to behind those barrels, maybe, so I have a little cover.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to run up and go after these two bowmen, I guess. Fuck me, what am I doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're all going to die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rush, running across the gangplank. As soon as you come to the edge you look down, and there's one of the guys who's about to turn with his bow and goes (gasp) and sees you--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just roundhouse him to the face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it, roll for an attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Motherfucker! Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten misses. You go and kick, and the water on the slick deck makes you slip. You catch yourself and don't tumble off the side--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You got to wear boat shoes!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. You go for one roundhouse and slip, using the momentum you spin with a lower circle kick, like a sweep kick, which is about head level with him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eight damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight points of damage? That'll do it. The bowmen don't have a lot of hit points.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They've been burned badly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He (groan) and then falls unconscious onto the deck of the ship.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I have enough-- can I get the other guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do have enough movement, you have 15 feet more, so you leap down onto his crumpled unconscious body, and his other friend is going to pull back to try and take a shot while he's backing up towards the back portion of the ship.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go: Melee range, you can't do it! And then a 19?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll hit. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Big money. Okay! Nine. Die! Die!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And so he-- You (impact sound), and he falls unconscious onto the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn to Marius and I say "The Gentleman sent us? Gentleman? You a Gentleman?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's like (startled gasping). Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We need to get onto the boat and get out of here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just killed or beat unconscious the guys he was coming to meet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We just flip this. We're going to jack this fucking boat and get out of here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven? He right now is looking panicked, and the words aren't coming through. He thinks maybe you're calling him a gentleman. He's like (panicked noises), and he's backing away from you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends Beau and Nott's turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Life is disappointing, eh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The door is partially open to the cabin below and there is light coming from the inside, some sort of lantern light. You hear things being moved around.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I stand on top of the door? Do I have enough movement to do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have five more feet to get to the door and look beneath but you don't see anything yet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to tamp it down, stand my full weight on top of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, the door is on the side, so you'd have to put your weight against it, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're up against the door. That brings us to Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we trying to get back on the boat now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I guess I'm going to-- fucking, like an asshole, run towards the boat. God, this is so dumb. I run towards the boat, but I'm going to-- as far as I can.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where are you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Way far away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to have to fucking wait ten minutes--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No you won't. No you won't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make an action to dash if you want to get there and do nothing else.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How hurt are you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've got me too. I'm still spelled up to all hell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'll double dash to get to the fucking boat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jump, Jester, jump!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus, you're up. No, sorry, Caleb!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I see which way the wind is blowing. I mutter a few arcane words and I cast the spell Expeditious Retreat, which is a transmutation spell so I will also send a little bit of arcane energy to the Transmutation stone to give myself extra speed as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can do that!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So, Vax is back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax is back, baby.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am now on the boat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my lord. He can do it again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughs roguishly) Action, movement, plus now Expeditious Retreat is a bonus action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. You can move 80 feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 40 plus 40 plus 40?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a bonus action to cast the spell. Oh, and when you cast the spell, and then as a bonus action-- oh, wow, so it's a dash action as the spell when it's cast as well, so yeah. That's 120 feet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whoa.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A red blur goes (zooming sound) and I am standing next to Beauregard on the boat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Flash! Aah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He'll save every one of us!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He went so fast he knocked me into the boat.

lines.name: MATT
