lines.text: You do, actually, Jester tumbles forward into the boat from the sheer force of Caleb (zooming sound) flashing into the space.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we stealing the boat?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, we're all here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does anyone know how to fucking drive a boat?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No one on the boat does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that finishes Caleb's turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The guy who's definitely not here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, the zhelezo are going to come.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From around this corner--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no! We swear we're not pirates!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Way to build that tension.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --begin to appear, and now the zhelezo that are coming around the corner are coming forward with torches. There are more a little further down the way, and they're shouting out, "What's going on? What is--" Looking around, they can see you, Fjord, they can see Yasha up on the side, and they can see people on the ship across the way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But that's their turn. They've acknowledged you and they're telling you to halt and they're asking for your attention. Now it's going to turn to Caduceus' turn. They do not see you. The sound you heard, you couldn't quite make out the direction it's coming from, but you can now hear it coming from around the edge of the street.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to ponder. I'm going to make the sound of a bunch of people panicking and saying, "Hide everything, hide everything."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With Thaumaturgy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're stretching the cantrip a bit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I thought, "you can create an instantaneous sound that originates from a point of your choice within range."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a sound, like a bird caw. You can't create the sound of a whole crowd screaming.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fair, that's fair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can do ominous whispers. It's listed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It is listed. I'm going to make one of the doors on that boat over there slam shut really loudly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (door slamming sound). It does so.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to run and hide behind the map. I'm going off the map around there. Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're going the other way? Away from everybody else?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to just be going--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll catch you upstream.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's going to go hang with the Ruby.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can't get the boat out of here fast enough before they can catch the boat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go ahead and-- actually, no, this would be on their end.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That'll just be 30 feet, and I'm not running, I'm walking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does catch their attention, and they look over, and the few that hadn't seen Fjord now look over and see Fjord on the dock as well. There you go. They are aware of those that are currently visible on the deck of the ship, and Fjord, and Yasha over there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends it-- Yasha's turn? What's Yasha going to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha's going to run her ass onto the boat. Double dash, if she needs to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She doesn't need to. With her speed she gets onto the ship there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, and she will assume the Dodge whatever in case they throw fire or something at her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That brings us to the top of the round. Fjord, your go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to Arnold Schwarzernegger from True Lies run and jump off the dock and dive into the water, heading straight towards the boat in a straight line because my speed is the same on land or in the water and I will double dash to the boat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Into the abyss.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bloop!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh man, all in one movement? That's--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's rad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll be like, "We're getting the fuck out of here. Shove off!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you do that, the guards are going, "Hey! Hey! Halt!" and they're drawing and loading crossbows. You are not stopping, you are not hailing, you are not listening to anything they're saying. They assume you are stealing a ship. Which you are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Am I going to be the only survivor in this? This'll be funny.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The sails are unfurled.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sail!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's still anchored, you notice as you get to the dock.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we tied up, too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. They were just starting to get the process going of getting the ship done, and there is still somebody down inside rummaging through the interior.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're off! (unsuccessful noise)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You as a sailor, you get there and asses the situation and you're like, "This is going to take a little bit to get the boat out of here."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No problem.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, through natural means. I don't know what you have at your disposal, but--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bury our shame.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you've taken your dodge action. All the bowmen are gone. That brings us to Beau and Nott.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I run over and I untie the boat from the thing. I undo the rope. Are we hitched to the dock with rope? And anchor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're tied onto the side, and then there's an anchor off the side.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With a cleat, or whatever they're called? I work on that because I'm assuming the anchor is heavy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You managed to pull it up. Make a Strength check to see if you can get it all the way up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The anchor? Okay, that's opposite from what I said.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, sorry, I misunderstood. You go ahead--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm trying to undo-- do I also have time to get the anchor up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not both. It's an action to untie and get it off the dock.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I will focus on untying and getting it off, and then I do the thing that you do where you push on the side of the dock, and I try and get us like (grunt of effort).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you shove off a bit. There's still a good distance. The gangplank is there, so it's not right up against the dock per se. There's not much you can push off of but you do manage to get it untied.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I get it untied. The boat's untied.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Nott?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is the stupidest thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is great. This is D&D, motherfuckers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The dumbest--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we can't launch. We've got five or six guards coming at us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vox Machina is dead, long live Vox Machina.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, they thought Vox Machina were assholes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, oh man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, there were a few times that Vox Machina was in this territory.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure, but this is our MO.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow. I mean, I've got to get on that boat, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Save yourself! Run away!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are there any more moorings or-- did she get off--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She managed to untie it from the dock itself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But the gangplank is holding us on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the gangplank is still resting--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's just resting there, so if we get moving, it'll just fall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will-- how far away am I? Ten, 20, 30. I don't know, I'll cast Silent Image.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That ends your turn, Nott. We'll say it appears--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bonus action hide!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. Right there at the edge of the dock.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That brings us to Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see the guards. They're arming crossbows. They're running towards the dock. One of them has his hands up, hailing, "Hey, hey!" and is trying to get your attention. What are you doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to crouch down, and I'm going to cast Invoke Duplicity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Where do you want it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Next to me, where I crouched down from. I'm going to have her pop up and run across the gangplank.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good to know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey Matt, that white ring is just leftovers, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that's the illusion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's the illusory captain that I just made appear at the end of the dock.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My turn? I give the Glove of Blasting a good tug and I send three arcs of fire up into the air, and they spiral around each other and crash down onto the dock about five to ten feet behind that illusion, and blast into the dock.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) That's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and roll an attack for the AC of wood, which isn't terribly high.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The AC of wood!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is. It has an AC.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. (gasps) Second's a natural one!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits the water. (sploosh)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Other one is way high, natural 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So two hit. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 12 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 damage. All right. (explosions) The dock splinters and bits of it char and burn and go flying. It (cracks) but it's still standing. It wasn't enough to destroy the entire dock. It's damaged.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I will use my movement to (zip) inside the boat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. (whoosh) You vanish inside the interior of the cabin, pushing past Beau, who's been holding the door shut.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow, what do you see down there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He turns around and sees you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I use a cantrip?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have a bonus action cantrip?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Getting the hang of it. Good good good. Done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's going instead to pull out his heavy crossbow, and load it. They're going to move up to the side here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Remember how, Jester, you couldn't come back to this town?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well now we all can't. You're never going to see your mom again. Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The weird butterfly effect of D&D actions.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This was just fucked from the first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We were just going to have a conversation with them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so the guards are going to go ahead and they're all going to fire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm crouched down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm hiding as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to be two against you, Fjord, two against Yasha, and one against Marius.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispers) Oh no. What if Marius dies?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Against Fjord, that is a 15 and a 17.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 17 will hit, 15 misses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. You take six points of piercing damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both against Jester... terrible rolls. That is a 12 and ten. They both just (whiff) past. Oh no, those were against Yasha.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, because I'm crouched.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to end the guards' turn. Caduceus. As you are--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to cast Disguise Self. I'm going to look like a-- I seem to recall-- I'm going to make a composite of the most pirate-y-- I've decided everyone who's on a boat is a pirate, so I'm going to make the most pirate-y, drunken old man I possibly can. I'm going to give myself a big, white beard, crazy hair, very unthreatening, buggy eyes. I'm going to continue to circle around the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30. That gets you just--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck those idiots.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm figuring I'm going to have to find you guys at some point, but yeah, this is... It's the only way I know how to get to the water, so...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (as Caduceus) That was interesting. That was really great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Finds his own adventure! (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't have a better way around--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that's it--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Unless there's a window. Unless there's an open passage on the back of one of those houses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is. It's a closed window, but you could try and break it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no, that's too--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're over on that side. That's the end of your turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just add B&E to the list.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Why not? Just go all in! Yasha...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's the best I got right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We want to pull up the anchor or are we moving yet?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I only unfurled, so if Yasha can yank up that anchor, that'd be dope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so Yasha goes over to the side, pulls it up (grunts). Gets it on the inside.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Now we're ready to go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're now currently not tethered to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With her movement, she'll stand in front of Marius like a human shield. From any arrows that might be coming.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. She's trying her best to protect Marius.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where's Keyleth when you need her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say, yeah. The time you really miss the Air Ashari... All right. Now it's Marius's turn. What Marius was going to do, he can't do now. Well, he might try.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's going to jump in the water.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Please don't be a dumbass. Marius.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, no. Hold on. Marius moves past Yasha.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I get an attack of bitch slapping?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gets up to the top of the edge of the ship. And... let me roll for him to see if-- that's actually pretty good, okay. He glances about the scenario, takes in his chances and what's happening, and stands up and goes, "Hold! Hold please! This is a big misunderstanding! "Let's talk this out!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To us, or everybody?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To the guards. For the sake of this, I'm going to have one of you guys roll for him. Who wants to roll his--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Persuasion check with disadvantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Terrible. Both were threes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why did you roll? Why didn't you roll?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're beyond convincing now, it looks like.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Wait!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, he did. But, you know. That finishes the round. Fjord, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't fucking know. Can I double dash down into the bow of the-- or belowdecks, where Caleb is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you make your way down, and you join up at the side of Caleb. You can see now, the Enforcer that's there, throwing the paper that's currently burning onto the table and he's pulling a weapon out and he's--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I have an action or did I double dash to get down here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You said double dash. It would have taken that to get there, so. All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I'll use my bonus action to cast Hexblade's Curse on that Enforcer. With the hope that he will soon be dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Now, as he sees you and he's pulling the blade, you rush into the fray, and what heavy shadows still lie in the bottom here, with the little bit of lantern and fire light that's lighting the space, the shadows get darker around him, and you can see everyone's breath is visible suddenly in this under chamber as the curse takes its hold on him. That goes to Beau and Nott.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do something, and I go, "Fjord!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau has never been on a ship.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Fjord, how do I sail?!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one sailor is below deck right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Fjord!" I still try--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Aw, man.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do what I think--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, yeah! Tie that there!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tie that? Okay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intelligence check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do the winch!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, okay! That was good! 19 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you look at it. You've been watching boats come into harbor, and you've read things about it, but mostly from your observational skills, which is one of your focuses and strengths, Beauregard, you're like, "Okay, I think I've seen people, you know, making ships go." You grab the ropes, you pull, and you yank past, and you watch as the sail picks up the wind and stiffens.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (accented) "We've caught the wind!" I've heard sailors say that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's like-- Beau, for those purposes, up on the top, there, holding the rope, and you're like, "Ah, okay, there's a sail!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's like a rudder, right? Nott, rudder, the boat!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I hate water! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott, what are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is anything constraining our movement? Is the gangplank in our way? Or are we unfettered at this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As far as you know, the gangplank is resting on there. You don't know if it's connected at all.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're starting to drift a little?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're starting to drift a little bit. The wind has picked up a little bit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Then I will run up and tackle Marius to the ground and wrestle him down. Get over here, you fucking-- Get-- Come on! Get down! We're trying to talk to you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an athletics check to grapple.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, wow. Athletics. Oh, that's just a straight 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Straight 18. Yeah. Like a wet paper bag, he goes over, "Ah!" (boof) and they both slam onto the deck below. You have him grappled and you're like holding him down. You're not-- you don't weigh a lot, but you're leveraging and pulling the weight in a way where he can't-- his knees are buckled and he can't actually get any ground to hold himself up, so. You got him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. That's all I got.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: this is going to be against you, Fjord, because you're the one that came in and cursed him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I know, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be a 15 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It misses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (impact) Shield off to one side. Natural 19.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is your, like, favored terrain and stuff. It's a boat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is a disaster.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is ten points of slashing damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm uncon-- No, I'll use my Relentless En-fucking-[slurred]

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I'm up to one hit point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seriously?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You (groan). You just manage to hold on by a thread. Your consciousness waning, your eyes focus angrily towards the target of your Hexblade's Curse.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just out of pity's sake. I'm disappointed I came back up to one hit point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't even know that's happening.

lines.name: SAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That brings us to Jester's turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great. I'm going to use my Duplicate to run forward...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What are we doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're saving the world, Marisha, we're saving the world.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to use my Pearl of Power to cast my last remaining 3rd-level spell, and I'm going to cast Charm Person on the three of the guards that I can see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Ones up front?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one up here is the leader, the one that was guiding them on stuff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, yeah, that's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He fails with a natural three. Two natural threes in a row! Fucking lucky. The third one on the far end... is a natural six. Okay. So. You are currently-- oh no, it's not concentration for Charm Person. Those three are charmed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For an hour.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're doing great, guys! We've killed everybody, we're charming people, we're on a boat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are technically in combat with you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is Frumpkin an octopus and is it lying back on the dock somewhere?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Frumpkin is not there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It is charmed by you until the spell ends or until your companions do anything harmful to it. When the spell ends-- It doesn't say anything about it not being in combat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Makes a wisdom saving throw and does so with advantage if you or your companions are fighting it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay. It doesn't say that on the thingy. Sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Although they haven't technically attacked... Oh, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, there's been enough aggressive action, they're considered fighting. They've all failed their save. I'm going to do one more roll for all of them. The leader-- that's cocked. That's a natural 12 plus two, 14. What's your DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15. That's a natural ten and a natural 11! They all fail again. Yeah, they're all still charmed. Well done.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are the odds?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's kind of crazy, actually. All right, so we'll say the red here is Charm Person.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can feel Travis's Dad disappointment, like radiating--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In himself?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In myself, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And in us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's hot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The three of them drop their weapons for a second and are looking confused. The ones behind are still loading and getting ready.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I guess I'm going to stay hidden on my end and try to make my way down. I can't do anything below, but okay, whatever, yeah. Yeah, I guess I'm going to try to go-- No, because I'm going to keep visual on Duplicate Jester. I'm going to stay hidden on the top.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that ends your turn, Jester. Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja I rub a bit of honey across my lip and say, "Mein Freund, I suggest you throw down your weapons and lie under that desk, just for your safety," and I cast Suggestion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. This is a natural seven, that's a failure. After slashing into Fjord and turning towards you and seeing that fall, he throws his weapon down and crawls under the table angrily, like "Grr, I'm going to get you under this table!" and then he gets there and looks very confused.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would like to use movement to zip up to the top and look around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's see here. Yeah, we'll say that's what his next action would be, since technically it's out of turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You mean climbing under the desk?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It's happening simultaneously.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I use my movement to zip up and look around and my bonus action to zip back down into the boat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look up and you see this scenario. You see the guards are still standing there at the edge. The ship is moving, it's slowly pulling away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't hit those guys in the front.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to the guards' turn. The two in the back are going to go ahead and fire. That's going to be one at Beau and one at Yasha. Against Beau, that is a 17 to hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Miss.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Against Yasha, that is a 16 to hit. I believe that does hit. She doesn't have a huge armor class, if I recall. She does take only five points of piercing damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that already halved because of raging?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, she hasn't attacked anything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're right, that would fall. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did she take damage last turn? Oh, she was attacked last turn, so she's still raging.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, she did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But there were a few rounds there where she didn't hit anything, so the rage fell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The guy that targeted Beau has to make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that's true. He fails, so he goes to fire and he has to choose another target.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, he just fails if on a fail--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, he can choose another target on Sanctuary.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hold up!" He starts shouting to hail in your direction, and the other guards are putting their weapons away and are about to walk over. The two in the back are like, "What?!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are not perceptive enough to have seen that it's a spell effect that has changed them. They're confused by it. We'll see if they figure it out soon. With that, these guys are going to begin to walk and make their way toward the broken docks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Possibly burning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They see the illusory guy there and look confused.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It just looks like me, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, there's another guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's the guy just waving to them. That's all he's doing repeatedly. He's like one of those mannequins holding the electrical signs on the street. Yeah, he's a wacky waving--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A wacky waver.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A half-orc.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's got the cardboard arrow, spinning it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Freestyle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These guards are going to chase up confused and they're going, "Sir! Sir! Sir!" and they're not entirely certain what's going on. They're really confused by the scenario. That's going to go to Caduceus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to NPC my ass right across the street.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to see if I can take my action and keep going quietly. Oh no, I'm not going that-- I'm going to go behind those. I'm getting in the water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, this way?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm getting in the water.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In the water?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to gently get in. Yeah, I'm sitting in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a ten-foot drop.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh is it a ten-foot drop?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: TALIESIN; Can I climb down instead of jumping?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, make an athletics check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is he Kaiju-sized?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am very tiny looking right now. Come on. Oh my god, that was almost terrible. Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine? You slip and fall a little bit. You get down about five feet and you make a splash sound.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a lot happening.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The dock's on fire, for crying out loud.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they don't notice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to slowly start making my way underneath everything, quietly and with--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five, ten, 15, 20. Yeah, you're slowly wading through the water.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that ends you're go. Yasha's turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha's going to turn and bear hug Marius.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm already on him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Awesome. She's going to assume the dodge-- Is there anything else to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can she help try to get the ship to move more?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does she know boats?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does Yasha know boats?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha, as far as you know, does not know boats. She's never mentioned anything about it, and Yasha looks like she doesn't know what she's doing. She's not giving orders, or rushing to take a post.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, I suppose she could run over to the gangplank and she could try to pull it and shove it against the dock and push off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The old plank shove.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha will go ahead and push on the gangplank. Make a strength check for Yasha shoving off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She shoves and the whole boat shifts suddenly. The gangplank plunges down into the water and it's floating there on the top. The ship gets shoved off about ten feet in that direction.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who could have predicted this? [music] Marius is just standing there, held by a goblin, going, "Ah!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stay down! Stay down!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, all right!", and he stays quiet there, and doesn't do anything. Fjord?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll back up to the top of the ship, where I should be useful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 feet of movement to get up there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I have an action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have 15 more feet of movement and you have an action.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll climb up onto where the rudder is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "Oh, you want this seafaring knowledge? What can you give me?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get up and man it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I start turning the bow of the ship out towards the sea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It starts arcing and making its way in that direction, turning slowly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm smashing my head into the fucking bow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't do it, you only have one hit point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I fall unconscious. When I wake up this will all be over. I do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, you don't.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, I do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fjord.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a bad idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It doesn't knock you unconscious, but you are dizzy as fuck. You have you hit your head real hard on there to do a point of damage. Do you want to do that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, that's fine. Frustration's good enough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Frustration, you'll hurt yourself, but to take a point of damage?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Frustration's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're like, "Ugh!" There's a little bit of blood trickling out from where the head got mashed a little bit. The partially splintered wood from the explosion of the Fireball earlier...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god, are we going to sink?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why would you say that out loud?! What's wrong with you?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, that's appropriate for today.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Fjord's turn. Now the ship is moving on initiative 20. The ship moves out and is over there now, and is turning this way. That brings us to Beau and Nott.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I see Fjord bash his head against the wall and I go, you guys, I think Fjord's under some sort of influence magic! He's not himself! Then I yank the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're just using your action to hold onto the sail and keep it open.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tell me what to do!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh right, you don't know how to sail the ship.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You motherfucker!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're the only one, really.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hoist the thing and then the other one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I try and interpret what he says. Hoist the thing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Listening to the thing, you eventually get her to figure it out. You get the sail situated, and that will be your action for the turn. Okay, Nott?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will spend my action seeing if there's any rope lying around, and trying to tie the man's hands up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a couple of coils of rope left there in the far corner of the-- you'll have to release him to go get it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will keep him and I will Mage Hand grab some rope and bring it over to me, but then that will be my action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still holding him, because he's keeping quiet, the rope hovers over and plops next to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then bonus action, I will use Mage Hand to start looping it around him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! Go ahead and make a sleight of hand check for me. Well, just a general dexterity check, actually. You're not proficient in this, necessarily, so just add your dexterity modifier.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you've begun the process. It's not an immediate--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, wait. No, it's just a seven. That's bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends your go. The Enforcer below, who has completed the-- now is when he's ducked behind, because he lost his action to do that. He now gets under the table, throws his weapon down, and goes, "What the fuck?" Goes to pick up the weapon; that's his turn. Jester, you go. It's so ridiculous.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did he just break it, is that what Caleb saw?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He realized he was being dumb.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's just doing it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's got to do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, but he performed the action.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, spell ends.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to pull out my axe, the duplicate, and I'm going to act like she hits herself with it-- so stupid-- and go (dying noise) and falls into the water.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's pretty good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She commits suicide in front of him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The leader goes, "No!", who considers you a friend at the moment and is seemingly really distraught to watch this happen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is happening?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's going to be floating in the water, and then I'm going to go--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I take it you're not concentrating on your Silent Image anymore?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm probably focusing on Marius? So no. I'm not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That vanishes right as she kills herself and falls into the water. Very confused.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then I'm going to, for my action as Jester, go and try to hold the door shut for the under--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You move up to the door and-- holding it there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I'm crawling, I don't want them to see me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just want to clarify. I thought that I had told him to throw down his weapons and hide under the desk for his safety. That's not an ongoing thing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He did that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But you don't go down and then immediately stand up and get out again, do you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He saved from the spell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, he saved from the spell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He went and hid under the table for safety, which he did.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hiding under the table for six seconds is a shitty job at hiding, but okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But it wasn't specific enough. It wasn't a very specific suggestion.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, that's fine. I have to totally rethink everything, so give me ten seconds. I will use my action to run forward and, with the edges of my coat, put out the burning papers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you downstairs? I thought you were upstairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see now, it looks like what was a map that is mostly burned entirely.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I see anything? As I'm doing this, yeah, if I'm looking at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the map? Yeah, you see part of the Coast, and you see some notes, and you see something on there. Clearly looking at it, there is information on it, but you're putting it out, (blowing).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, that's it, I'm done. I would say that probably what I would've done, not knowing any of that, is zip up to go up and then see if the door is shut and go-- and that's the end of my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be your turn. That brings us to the guards' turn. The guards in the back are shaking the other guard, "What are you doing? They're getting away!" He's like, "Look. This is a "very confusing scenario, and we're trying to ascertain what's happening. They seem safe for "now, but why did this dock explode?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Also, there's a girl floating in the water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She just killed herself, go check on her, make sure she's okay!" The guard's like-- Natural 20. They're like, "This is foul magic." He starts slapping him in the face and he's like, "Get away," and he's like, "Call a mage, we have to get this taken care of."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh, the mage. A mage, or the mage?

lines.name: LAURA, LIAM
lines.text: A mage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They start shouting for help. Frumpkin's still hanging out over here. I figured you would've blinked Frumpkin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I was casting Find Familiar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guards are now--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it interrupted that with the fight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's their action. Caduceus?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm swimming full speed directly out into the ocean.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, yeah, no, I'm not having a good--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So brave.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: --this is not going well for me. I'm not a happy camper.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you even have dark vision?

lines.name: MATT, TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're swimming out into the dark? (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's torches, for now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, there's a single torch over here that is loosely lighting the vicinity.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And, I assume that there's some kind of light on the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For Caduceus-- you do have a high passive perception. There are shapes in the water below.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Would I have noticed that before swimming 30 feet out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're getting out under the dock and you-- and a little bit of light that's coming through from the moonlight, you look and you can see something in the water.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. Yasha's go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, Yasha's...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 40 feet off the dock.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Help me, Yasha!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha assists Beau in getting the ship--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. You're just holding the ship. Not much else to do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so, at this point, Marius is-- there's not much else he can do. Fjord, your turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keeping an eye out for Caduceus, start to steer the ship along the coastline this way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, make a perception check, please.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wow, Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. You do...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's right. There's an old man swimming in the ocean.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do see-- (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Geriatric bathing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh lord! (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This could not be more fucked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter) I'm so happy!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't worry. It's not what we came for. Keep going!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This went so far from any of my expectations! I love Dungeons & Dragons!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, fuck that guy. Where's Caduceus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so keeping up with that, that ends Fjord's turn. The boat now moves on initiative count 20 to there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look at that old fucker out there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking skinny dippers. What the fuck? Polar Bear Plunge.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, it's that kind of city.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Beau and Nott, we'll say for the purposes of expediency on this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I just need some help tying this fucker up. I bring him up to Fjord.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! I'm going to let Caleb out from below. I'm assuming I could have heard Caleb going--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You felt the door go (thump). That's all you know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You assume I'm down there, I guess.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, if I look around--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't see Caleb on the ship. Where's Caleb?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where's Caleb?! I open the door! Caleb!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, Caleb's standing there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Caleb, you doing anything?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. I turn to the guy who-- he picked up his weapons by now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, he's making his way up the stairs after you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, okay, I reach out and use Catapult, and a drawer pulls out of the desk and slams into the back of his head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead roll for attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dex save for that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that's right. Ah, it's cocked. Natural six.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, it's a failure, so that is 3d8.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does the drawer have fruit in it, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, yeah, scurvy, you know?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 17 points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 points of damage. (crash) Right in the back of the skull. He's like, "Ahh!", and you can see him holding back, he's holding the sword. He's hurt. But he's still coming at you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (arrow noise) I am standing next to Fjord and Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) All right. With an immediate burst of speed in a rush, very akin to The Flash making his way through the city, Caleb just (poof!) appears there on top with Fjord and Beau.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Feels good, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guy who's now looking at you, Jester, you see the guy had his sword out and, "Ah!", looks confused and sees you and goes, (growls) and is going to come up with the sword. He doesn't realize how fucked he is. He doesn't know that the ship has been taken. He's feeling pretty competent.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's the only one having a worse day than us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He comes up and is going to make two swings at you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I use Hellish Rebuke.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, first you have to see if it hits. That is going to be a 15 to hit. I believe that misses.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a 19 to hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, yes. I use Hellish Rebuke.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go for it. That is ten points of slashing damage to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A two-handed (whoosh) swings past you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He takes 21 points of damage back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He has to make a save, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a natural 14, but has no bonus to his dex, so it's a 14.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it's only a 12 dex save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, because it's a racial ability.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it's a racial ability.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He takes half damage? What is it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did I say? 21? Half of that, 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus. (counting) You're just like, (breathing hard). As you glance over--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (old man voice) Hey!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Little help here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that his voice?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not doing a voice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sounds so familiar. Man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not having a good day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whose turn is it to get him up?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Yasha goes up and brings Caduceus back onto the ship.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where the fuck were you? Who are you? You are clearly Cad.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A miracle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fjord needs healing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I have a bonus action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have a bonus action.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to do a Healing Word on Fjord before I start doing another--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Prayer?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, before I start doing another prayer, I'm going to cast Healing Word on Fjord really quickly, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You got it, Fjord.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's seven points of hit points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven points to you. Fjord, anything? Just keeping the ship going?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just sail. Yep, just sail.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go to the back of the boat to see the name of the boat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On this way. The boat continues on for another 20 or 30 feet-- actually 30 feet. It's starting to get a little speed and it's picking up the wind as it's making its way curving out towards the harbor. The guards continue running off. These guys are all searching for the body of the woman.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Heroes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We did it, guys. Mission accomplished.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Enforcer actually technically would have his attack on this round. I missed that. The Enforcer does his attacks on you, Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Can I hit back? Because I--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can. It's your turn now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, then... yeah. I'm going to-- I get two attacks, don't I? No, I just get one attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get one attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (pigeon coo) Don't kill him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not going to. Instead of killing him, I'm going to say, you probably don't want to attack me. We've got a boat full of people. We just took your ship. You should put down your weapon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intimidation check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As she put her hands up, he can see her flexing biceps.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Intimidation, 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13? He doesn't buy it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? They're right here. Look behind me, you stupid. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's like back in-- The deck isn't very high. He can't really look and see the ship before you entirely. He's just seeing you right there in the way. He's just hacking at you with his sword.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the words don't come through. He thinks it's a bluff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh my goodness. Okay. I will go down after Jester and stand behind her to see what the situation is with my movement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are down next to her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh goodness. I don't want to set the-- I say, "Hey! Why don't you put down that weapon and let's talk about this?" and I cast Friends, which would be a disadvantage, I'm sure. You have advantage on all charisma checks. Yeah, so: It's very dangerous. You're going to die, probably sooner rather than later unless you want to talk shop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Persuasion.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Persuasion with disadvantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Disadvantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's straight. Because you cast...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Straight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, what did you roll?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Seven. Shit. That's persuasion, ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you guys are all standing on the door and going like, "Come on, bud. Come on!" He's going, "No! No! You're lying!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't want to burn with the boat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the guards aren't an issue anymore at the moment. Caduceus, anything you need to do? Or you just holding on the ship?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm sitting and starting a Prayer of Healing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are picking up speed now as the wind has come in and the ship is now making its way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Honestly, I think we did a pretty good job after everything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You turned it around a little bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We got a ship!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was going bad.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is fucking fun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, yeah. That's why I love when shit goes wrong like this. These are my favorite moments in D&D. The Enforcer is going to go ahead and take two more attacks on you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nobody's going down there to help Jester?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going like "Ow, ow, ow!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know what, no! He does see Caleb. Now actively takes a look behind, and then turns around and runs down below deck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, there's more below?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He just ran back down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's running down below deck. You do get an attack of opportunity if you want to take it, Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kill him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Toll the Dead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it has to be my handaxe. Yeah, that definitely hits, 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that'll hit. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ten points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he turns around, you're like, "No, wait!" (shunk) Into the back of his skull. He falls and (thump), slides down the stairs limply.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think I'm going to use my cantrip Spare the Dying and make sure he doesn't die die. Does he die die?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, you put an axe to the back of his head.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't want to kill him. Like that wasn't my goal, but I didn't say that out loud.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You didn't say that out loud.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stress of the moment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not your turn. You don't have a bonus action because it's a reaction. You wouldn't be able to use it until next round.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry, it really wasn't my intention to do that. I was aiming for his shoulder, and I missed and hit his head.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It Wasn't My Intention: the name of this episode.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's great!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That, or the AC of Wood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The AC of Wood is a good Alpha title.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: From "It wasn't my intention."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There'll probably be a search party.

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: (sing-song) You can never go back!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The good news is, you don't think they were paying attention to the back of he ship, thanks to the distraction that you set, so they don't know the name of the ship. That might help to your advantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Which is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is called--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Widow's Embrace?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it is not. It is called The Mist.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With an I or a Y?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a I.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Mist.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now pushing past midnight to the very early morning hours, you make your way out and as far away from the edge. You can see the lights of Nicodranas begin to fade a bit, just enough where you can feel comfortable. Marius is there bound by ropes. There, still wild eyed, and looking at all this, "All right, then. Who the fuck are you?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who the fuck are you? You piece of shit!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We know his name.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know who he is! I'm asking him! Fucking piece of shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's all we know is his name.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My name is Marius LePual."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, we know! I'm saying you're a piece of shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What did I do?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So many things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm very confused."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What were you doing on the docks this evening?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks around, he's like, "I was coming to tell some business contacts of mine that something "they hired me for didn't pan out."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasp)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you happen to know where those business contacts came from, these people? Do you know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know, they're very mysterious."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would it mean anything if we said that we come bearing gifts and that we are looking to see the Captain? I'll reach behind my hand and use Minor Illusion and create a little replica of the cat eye sphere and hold it out in front of him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. He goes, "Why didn't you say that in the beginning?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I did say that. I kind of did. I was like, Gentleman.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know a Gentleman. I just know that I was supposed to look for that delivery."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: From who?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Whoever was going to bring it. I didn't expect for you to come in here and slaughter my contacts."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are your ambitions with it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Nothing. I was going to make some coin, pass it over. That was it."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's a runner. Who were you supposed to deliver it to?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know. Mysterious folk."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The guy we just killed?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mysterious folk. Where were you supposed to drop it off? You knew where you were supposed to deliver it, so where were you supposed to deliver it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It was supposed to come find me in the cove, never showed up, and they had been waiting "in town for a few days, and they were coming back and I-- this was the night where I was supposed to "tell them-- either bring it to them or the deal was off and I was supposed to give back the money "that I owed them. So-- "

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would like to point out that you're trapped on this boat with us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know that! I am very well aware of that right now. I'm a little freaked out, not going to lie."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tomorrow my blue friend is going to, if we need to, cast a spell on you and make you tell us everything we want to know. Why waste that time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intimidation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's also maps downstairs. I don't know that, he knows that, never mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes, "Right. I'm being truthful. I know it was supposed to be for a captain, Captain Evantica. She's a right intense person. I've only seen her once. She doesn't really leave her ship in port, when she's in, which is rare. Her reputation keeps her not from coming in directly."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's the name of her ship?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, her ship is the Squall Eater."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Squall Eater?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What is her reputation?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She's a bit of a forceful taker of things she wants."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's a pirate!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm just hired as the errand boy."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Slavain Islands?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Swavain. S-W-A-V-A-I-N. "I was just supposed to come back here. Supposed to meet up with the folks of the Mist, the ship that you've now commandeered. You've killed them all. What are you going to do with me?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is a good question.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm useful. I'm helpful! I can swab the deck. I can cook."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What can you cook? That's interesting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What you got?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't know what we got. We stole this ship.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, yeah you did."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have we patted him down?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll pat him down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: By this point, by the way, everyone has 16 hit points added to their--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 18 for investigation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you find a pouch of 20 platinum pieces.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's the money he was going to return.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a lot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what he got paid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find another pouch that's hidden within his belt pouch that contains 62 gold pieces, three silver, 50 copper, and what looks to be a pouch of chewing tobacco.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. What looks to be a pouch of chewing tobacco. Okay, got it. Could be spice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, so you're not going to kill me, right?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're not sure yet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're probably not going to kill you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's fine. That's good odds. I'll take those odds. Can you at least loosen these a bit."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tighten them and tie him to the mast will you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Yasha picks him up and ties him to the mast, he's like, "Oh!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe you'll earn your way to that, we'll see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay, well, where are we going then?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You'll find out soon enough.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take a handkerchief and I shove it into his mouth, and tie that around too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did we show him this letter?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean we already said.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know but, we don't know who this letter was written to, do we? We know who it was from and what it was telling the person-- wait no, it's from--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ionos.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ionos. Do you know Ionos?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Take the thing off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you know Ionos?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, I don't know an Ionos."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughing)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We didn't know that already.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We did not know about Evantica or her ship.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, her name's right here. It says "Meet the Captain, Evantica."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We didn't know she was the captain.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We didn't know anything about her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could have asked.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go downstairs. Maybe we can find something useful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To be fair, the goal was to just ask, and then it got out of hand.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb's heading down to start searching.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll follow him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys all head down below deck to take in what exactly you have at your disposal, as you are now the current owners of the Mist.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You guys, we own a ship!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A ship, a dog, an owl, a ferret.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't have our dog anymore.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh yeah! (yelling) Professor Thaddeus! (hooting) Professor Thaddeus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Professor Thaddeus is somewhere at the city.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh! First pet down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (hooting)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an animal handling check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to roll big. I'm not going to roll big. I'm going to roll great.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're like a quarter of a mile out to sea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I had him with me. 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not while fighting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I imagine when I fought I was like, "Go, hang out."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Total of what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19. You're shouting out to the sky. Time passes. No Professor Thaddeus.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's eating mice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He was like me. He's not meant to be tied down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's doing what he loves best. Ignoring everything else.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll have a proper burial at sea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's not dead. He's just running far away from me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or he's chasing the ship and he can't catch up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Professor!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you head down below deck to take stock of what you have, we're going to end there. We'll pick up next week.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everything went great.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it was fun! Honestly, I think it was terrible but it was cool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, it was so much fun.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh man, that was a lot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like, we didn't mean to get the flying carpet. We ended up bringing the entire tower down upon ourselves, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fair.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That map is gorgeous!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you! That was fun.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What would the captain have told us, though?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who knows!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who knows. He got splattered.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He didn't even make an attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No he didn't! He was going to be the nasty one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyways, well done, guys. You have a boat and a handful of people in the city that saw your faces. Most of your faces.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Man, thanks for that. You keep presenting with stuff that we don't really want, but then we see it and we're like, "We need it!" Then we don't want it, like animals. Now we have a boat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And there's an owl somewhere.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well think about, nobody that saw us in the city, saw us taking the boat lived to tell the tale. Just kidding, all of the guards right there did.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nicodranas!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we go on to the next town, or do we try to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's up to you guys to figure out next time we come around.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [music]
